                               has_credits: current_user.has_credits?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                             } : nil,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                             authenticated: !!current_user
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                           }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

            def render_404

            def render_500(exception = nil)

    68.

      73.

            def redirect_authenticated_user

            # Job priority helper - enqueue jobs with user's priority level
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            def enqueue_job_with_priority(job_class, user, *args)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

              job_class.set(priority: user.job_priority).perform_later(*args)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89.

            def article_routes(article)

      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                export_html: export_article_path(article, format: 'html'),
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                retry_article: retry_article_path(article),
          
      109.

                regenerate_article: regenerate_article_path(article),
          
      110.

      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

              }
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112.

              # GET /keywords/:id/generate

              def new
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if article already exists
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                if @keyword.article.present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to article_path(@keyword.article), alert: "Article already exists for this keyword"

      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

      14.

              # POST /projects/:project_id/articles

              def create

      37.

              # GET /articles/:id/export
          
      75.

              def export
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                format = params[:format] || "markdown"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                case format
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                when "markdown", "md"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_data @article.export_markdown,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                            filename: "#{sanitize_filename(@article.keyword.keyword)}.md",
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                            type: "text/markdown",
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                            disposition: "attachment"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                when "html"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_data @article.export_html,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                            filename: "#{sanitize_filename(@article.keyword.keyword)}.html",
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                            type: "text/html",
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                            disposition: "attachment"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90.

      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      93.

      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /articles/:id/retry
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

              def retry
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                unless @article.failed?
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to article_path(@article), alert: "Can only retry failed articles"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.retry!
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to article_path(@article), notice: "Retrying article generation..."
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /articles/:id/regenerate
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

              def regenerate
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if user has credits (regenerate costs a credit)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user.has_credits?
          
      109.

      110.

                  return

    111.

      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112.

    115.

    116.

      120.

              end
          
      121.

              def set_keyword

                @keyword = Keyword.joins(keyword_research: :project)

              def sanitize_filename(filename)

              def subscribe
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                Stripe.api_key = ENV["STRIPE_SECRET_KEY"]
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                price_id = params[:price_id]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14.

                # Verify this is a valid plan
          
      15.

      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                return redirect_to pricing_path, alert: "Invalid plan selected" unless plan
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                customer = current_user.payment_processor&.processor_id || current_user.set_payment_processor(:stripe).processor_id
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                session = Stripe::Checkout::Session.create(
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  mode: "subscription",
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  line_items: [ { price: price_id, quantity: 1 } ],
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  customer: customer,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  success_url: root_url,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  cancel_url: pricing_url
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to session.url, allow_other_host: true
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      28.

      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              def portal

                Stripe.api_key = ENV["STRIPE_SECRET_KEY"]

                else

                def require_authentication

                  resume_session || request_authentication

                end

                def resume_session

    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  Current.session ||= find_session_by_cookie
          
      30.

                end
          
      31.

                def find_session_by_cookie
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  Session.find_by(id: cookies.signed[:session_id]) if cookies.signed[:session_id]
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36.

                def request_authentication
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  session[:return_to_after_authenticating] = request.url
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_session_path
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                def after_authentication_url
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  session.delete(:return_to_after_authenticating) || "/app"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                def start_new_session_for(user)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.sessions.create!(user_agent: request.user_agent, ip_address: request.remote_ip).tap do |session|
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    Current.session = session
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    cookies.signed.permanent[:session_id] = { value: session.id, httponly: true, same_site: :lax }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                def terminate_session
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  Current.session.destroy
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  cookies.delete(:session_id)

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class EmailVerificationController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              allow_unauthenticated_access only: [:show]
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def show
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                if user = User.find_by_token_for(:email_verification, params[:token])
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.verify_email!
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  if authenticated? && current_user == user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to "/app", notice: "Email verified successfully!"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to login_path, notice: "Email verified! Please sign in to continue."
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to root_path, alert: "Email verification link is invalid or has expired."
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to "/app", notice: "Verification email sent. Please check your email."
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            class OauthController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              allow_unauthenticated_access

    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def callback
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                auth = request.env["omniauth.auth"]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                email = auth.dig("info", "email")
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                first_name = auth.dig("info", "first_name") || auth.dig("info", "given_name") || "User"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                last_name = auth.dig("info", "last_name") || auth.dig("info", "family_name") || "User"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                provider = auth.provider
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                uid = auth.uid
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract plan from OAuth state parameter
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                selected_plan = nil
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:state].present?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    state_data = JSON.parse(params[:state])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    selected_plan = state_data["plan"]
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Failed to parse OAuth state parameter: #{e.message}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                user = User.find_or_initialize_by(email_address: email)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                if user.new_record?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  # New Google user
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.first_name = first_name
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.last_name = last_name
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.password = SecureRandom.hex(24)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.password_confirmation = user.password
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.email_verified_at = Time.current # Auto-verify Google emails
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.oauth_provider = provider
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.oauth_uid = uid
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.save!
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  start_new_session_for(user)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Handle plan selection
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  if selected_plan && selected_plan != "free"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    plan_id = find_plan_id_by_name(selected_plan)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    if plan_id
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                      redirect_to subscribe_path(price_id: plan_id), notice: "Welcome! Account created with Google."
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                      redirect_to "/app", notice: "Welcome! Account created with Google."
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to "/app", notice: "Welcome! Account created with Google."
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Existing user - just sign them in
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  start_new_session_for(user)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to "/app", notice: "Signed in with Google"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              def failure

              def find_plan_id_by_name(plan_name)

                return nil if plan_name.blank?

    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                plan = PlansService.all_plans.find { |p| p[:name].downcase == plan_name.downcase }

                plan&.dig(:id)
          
      67.

              def update

                if @user.update(params.permit(:password, :password_confirmation))
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_session_path, notice: "Password has been reset."

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_password_path(params[:token]), alert: "Passwords did not match."
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                def set_user_by_token
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user = User.find_by_password_reset_token!(params[:token])
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ActiveSupport::MessageVerifier::InvalidSignature
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_password_path, alert: "Password reset link is invalid or has expired."
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      34.

    app/controllers/projects_controller.rb

            # app/controllers/projects_controller.rb

            class ProjectsController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_project, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /projects
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @projects = current_user.projects.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                render inertia: "App/Projects/Index", props: {
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  projects: @projects.map { |p| project_props(p) }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14.

              # GET /projects/new
          
      15.

              def new

                render inertia: "App/Projects/New"
          
      17.

      18.

              # POST /projects
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                @project = current_user.projects.new(project_params.except(:competitors))
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                if @project.save
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Handle competitors from form submission
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_competitors(params[:project][:competitors])
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Automatically start keyword research
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  research = @project.keyword_researches.create!(status: :pending)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  KeywordResearchJob.perform_later(research.id)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to project_path(@project), notice: "Project created! Researching keywords..."
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_project_path, alert: @project.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /projects/:id
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              def show
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get the latest keyword research
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research = @project.keyword_researches.order(created_at: :desc).first
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                @keywords = @project.keywords.by_opportunity.limit(50)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                render inertia: "App/Projects/Show", props: {
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  project: project_props(@project).merge(routes: project_routes(@project)),
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywordResearch: @keyword_research ? keyword_research_props(@keyword_research) : nil,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords: @keywords.map { |k| keyword_props(k) }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49.

              # PATCH/PUT /projects/:id

              def update
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                if @project.update(project_params.except(:competitors))
          
      60.

                  # Handle competitors from form submission

                  handle_competitors(params[:project][:competitors])

    64. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_project_path(@project), alert: @project.errors.full_messages.to_sentence

    66. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      67.

              # POST /projects/autofill
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

              def autofill
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                domain = params[:domain]
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                niche = params[:niche]
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                unless domain.present?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { error: "Domain is required" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                service = AutofillProjectService.new(domain, niche: niche)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                result = service.perform
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                render json: result
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Autofill failed: #{e.message}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                render json: { error: "Autofill failed: #{e.message}" }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_project
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                @project = current_user.projects.find(params[:id])
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to projects_path, alert: "Project not found"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

              def project_params
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                params.require(:project).permit(
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  :name,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  :domain,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  :niche,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  :tone_of_voice,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  :sitemap_url,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  :description,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  seed_keywords: [],
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  call_to_actions: [:text, :url],
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitors: [:domain, :title, :description, :source]
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

              def handle_competitors(competitors_data)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless competitors_data.present?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                # Clear existing competitors that are not in the new list
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                existing_domains = @project.competitors.pluck(:domain)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter out empty competitors
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                valid_competitors = competitors_data.select { |c| c[:domain].present? }
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                new_domains = valid_competitors.map { |c| c[:domain] }
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                # Remove competitors that were deleted from the form
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                @project.competitors.where.not(domain: new_domains).destroy_all
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add or update competitors
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                valid_competitors.each do |competitor_data|
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  domain = competitor_data[:domain]
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  title = competitor_data[:title]
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  description = competitor_data[:description]
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  source = competitor_data[:source] || 'manual'
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Find existing or create new
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor = @project.competitors.find_or_initialize_by(domain: domain)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor.title = title if title.present?
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor.description = description if description.present?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor.source = source
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor.save
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

              # Serialization helpers
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

              def project_props(project)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  id: project.id,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  name: project.name,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  domain: project.domain,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  niche: project.niche,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  tone_of_voice: project.tone_of_voice,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  sitemap_url: project.sitemap_url,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  description: project.description,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  seed_keywords: project.seed_keywords || [],
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  call_to_actions: project.call_to_actions,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitors: project.competitors.map { |c| { id: c.id, domain: c.domain, title: c.title, description: c.description, source: c.source } },
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  created_at: project.created_at,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitors_count: project.competitors.count,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords_count: project.keywords.count,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  articles_count: project.articles.count
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

              def keyword_research_props(research)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  id: research.id,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: research.status,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_keywords_found: research.total_keywords_found,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  progress_log: research.progress_log || [],
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  started_at: research.started_at,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_at: research.completed_at,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  error_message: research.error_message
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              def keyword_props(keyword)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  id: keyword.id,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword: keyword.keyword,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume: keyword.volume,

            class WebhooksController < ApplicationController

              allow_unauthenticated_access

    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def stripe
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                payload = request.body.read
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                sig_header = request.env['HTTP_STRIPE_SIGNATURE']
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                event = Stripe::Webhook.construct_event(payload, sig_header, ENV['STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET'])
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                Pay::Webhooks::Stripe.new.call(event)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                head :ok
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue JSON::ParserError, Stripe::SignatureVerificationError
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                head :bad_request
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

            # app/jobs/article_generation_job.rb

            class ArticleGenerationJob < ApplicationJob
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              queue_as :default
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(article_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @article = Article.find(article_id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_cost = 0.0
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting ArticleGenerationJob for Article ID: #{article_id}"
          
      10.

      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Start generating
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(status: :generating, started_at: Time.current)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress("Starting article generation...")
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 1: SERP Research
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Researching top 10 Google results...")
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                serp_result = perform_serp_research
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_cost += serp_result[:cost]
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                if serp_result[:data].nil?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  fail_with_message("SERP research failed", @total_cost)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(serp_data: serp_result[:data])
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Found #{serp_result[:data]['common_topics']&.size || 0} common topics from competitors")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 2: Generate Outline
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Generating article outline with AI...")
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                outline_result = generate_outline(serp_result[:data])
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_cost += outline_result[:cost]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                if outline_result[:data].nil?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  fail_with_message("Outline generation failed", @total_cost)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(outline: outline_result[:data])
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                target_words = outline_result[:data]['sections']&.sum { |s| s['target_word_count'] || 0 } || 2000
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Outline created (targeting #{target_words} words)")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 3: Write Article

    43.

      44.

                writing_result = write_article(outline_result[:data], serp_result[:data])
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_cost += writing_result[:cost]
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                if writing_result[:data].nil?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  fail_with_message("Article writing failed", @total_cost)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(content: writing_result[:data])
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                word_count = writing_result[:data].split.size
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Draft complete (#{word_count} words)")
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 4: Improve Article
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Improving article quality (3 passes)...")
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                improvement_result = improve_article(writing_result[:data], serp_result[:data])
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_cost += improvement_result[:cost]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                if improvement_result[:data].nil?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  fail_with_message("Article improvement failed", @total_cost)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(content: improvement_result[:data])
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate final stats
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                final_word_count = improvement_result[:data].split.size
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract title and meta from outline
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                title = outline_result[:data]['title']
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                meta_description = outline_result[:data]['meta_description']
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  title: title,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  meta_description: meta_description,

    78.
