      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  generation_cost: @total_cost,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: :completed,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_at: Time.current
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                duration = (Time.current - @article.started_at).round(1)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Article complete! #{final_word_count} words  $#{@total_cost.round(2)}  #{duration}s")
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "ArticleGenerationJob completed for Article ID: #{article_id}"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Article ID #{article_id} not found"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      92.

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                # Mark article as failed if it exists
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                if @article
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: :failed,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    error_message: "Job error: #{e.message}",
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    generation_cost: @total_cost,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed_at: Time.current
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  broadcast_progress(" Generation failed: #{e.message}")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              end

              private

              def perform_serp_research
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                service = SerpResearchService.new(@article.keyword.keyword)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                service.perform
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate_outline(serp_data)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                # Voice profile is NOT used for outlines, only for writing
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                service = ArticleOutlineService.new(
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.keyword.keyword,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  serp_data,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  voice_profile: nil,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  target_word_count: @article.target_word_count
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                service.perform
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              def write_article(outline, serp_data)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                # Voice profile is on User model, not Project
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                voice_profile = @article.project.user.voice_profile
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                service = ArticleWriterService.new(@article.keyword.keyword, outline, serp_data, voice_profile: voice_profile)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                service.perform
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

              def improve_article(markdown, serp_data)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                service = ArticleImprovementService.new(markdown, serp_data)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                service.perform
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

              def fail_with_message(error_message, cost)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: :failed,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  error_message: error_message,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  generation_cost: cost,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_at: Time.current
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" #{error_message}")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

              def broadcast_progress(message)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                ArticleChannel.broadcast_to(
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    id: @article.id,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: @article.status,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    word_count: @article.word_count,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                    generation_cost: @total_cost,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    progress_message: message,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    started_at: @article.started_at,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed_at: @article.completed_at,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    error_message: @article.error_message
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      163.

    app/jobs/keyword_research_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/jobs/keyword_research_job.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Background job for running keyword research
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class KeywordResearchJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              queue_as :default
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(keyword_research_id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research = KeywordResearch.find(keyword_research_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting KeywordResearchJob for ID: #{keyword_research_id}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Update status to processing
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research.update!(
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: :processing,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  started_at: Time.current
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress("Starting keyword research...")
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                # Run the keyword research service with progress callbacks
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                service = KeywordResearchService.new(@keyword_research)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 1: Scrape domain
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Scraping your domain for content analysis...")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                service.send(:scrape_domain)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Domain content analyzed")
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 2: Discover and scrape competitors
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Discovering and scraping competitors with Grounding...")
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                service.send(:discover_and_scrape_competitors)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                competitor_count = service.instance_variable_get(:@competitor_data)&.size || 0
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Discovered and scraped #{competitor_count} competitors")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 3: Generate seed keywords
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_progress(" Generating seed keywords (using competitor insights)...")
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                service.send(:generate_seed_keywords)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                seed_count = @keyword_research.seed_keywords.size
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research.seed_keywords.first(10).each do |seed|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  broadcast_progress(" #{seed}", indent: 1)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                if seed_count > 10
          
      40.

                  broadcast_progress(" ... and #{seed_count - 10} more", indent: 1)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      42.

                end

      93.

            # app/services/ai/client_service.rb

            class Ai::ClientService
          
      3.

              # Model configuration for different services

              # Using gpt-4o-mini for everything as it's cheaper than gemini-2.5-flash
          
      5.

              MODELS = {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                keyword_analysis: { provider: "openai", model: "gpt-4o-mini" },
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                outline_generation: { provider: "openai", model: "gpt-4o-mini" },
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                article_writing: { provider: "openai", model: "gpt-4o-mini" },
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                article_improvement: { provider: "openai", model: "gpt-4o-mini" },
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                serp_analysis: { provider: "openai", model: "gpt-4o-mini" },
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                # NEW: Grounding research providers
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                grounding_research: { provider: "gemini", model: "gemini-2.0-flash-exp" },
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                perplexity_search: { provider: "perplexity", model: "sonar" },
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                openai_search: { provider: "openai", model: "gpt-4o" } # Future
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              }.freeze
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(service_name)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                config = MODELS[service_name]
          
      20.

                @provider = config[:provider]
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                @model = config[:model]

                @service_name = service_name
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              # Standard chat (no grounding)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              def chat(messages:, max_tokens: 1000, temperature: 0.7, system_prompt: nil)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "AI Request: #{@provider}/#{@model} (tokens: #{max_tokens})"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  chat = RubyLLM.chat(provider: @provider, model: @model)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                                .with_temperature(temperature)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Provider-specific parameters
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  case @provider
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "gemini"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    chat = chat.with_params(generationConfig: {
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                      maxOutputTokens: max_tokens
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    })
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "perplexity"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    chat = chat.with_params(
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                      max_tokens: max_tokens,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                      return_citations: true, # Perplexity-specific
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                      return_related_questions: false
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    chat = chat.with_params(max_tokens: max_tokens)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add system instructions
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  chat = chat.with_instructions(system_prompt) if system_prompt.present?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get response
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  prompt = messages.last[:content]
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = chat.ask(prompt)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: true, content: response.content, raw_response: response }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue RubyLLM::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "AI Auth Error: #{e.message}"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: false, error: "Authentication failed" }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue RubyLLM::RateLimitError => e
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "AI Rate Limit: #{e.message}"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: false, error: "Rate limit exceeded" }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "AI Error: #{e.message}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

              # NEW: Chat with Gemini grounding (google_search tool)

              def chat_with_grounding(messages:, max_tokens: 8000, temperature: 0.3)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "AI Grounding Request: #{@provider}/#{@model} (tokens: #{max_tokens})"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                raise "Grounding only supported with Gemini" unless @provider == "gemini"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  chat = RubyLLM.chat(provider: @provider, model: @model)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                                .with_temperature(temperature)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                                .with_params(
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                                  tools: [{ google_search: {} }], # Enable Google Search grounding
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                                  generationConfig: {
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                                    maxOutputTokens: max_tokens
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                                  }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                                )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  prompt = messages.last[:content]
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = chat.ask(prompt)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: true, content: response.content, raw_response: response }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue RubyLLM::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "AI Auth Error: #{e.message}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: false, error: "Authentication failed" }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue RubyLLM::RateLimitError => e
          
      95.

                  Rails.logger.warn "AI Rate Limit: #{e.message}"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  { success: false, error: "Rate limit exceeded" }

      100.

                end

            # app/services/article_generation_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Orchestrates the complete article generation pipeline
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class ArticleGenerationService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(article)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @article = article
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = article.keyword
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @project = article.project
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                total_cost = 0.0
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(status: :generating, started_at: Time.current)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "=" * 80
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "ARTICLE GENERATION: #{@keyword.keyword}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "=" * 80
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Step 1: SERP Research
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  # SWITCH BETWEEN OLD AND NEW APPROACH HERE:
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  # NEW: Google Grounding (recommended) - uncomment to use
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  serp_result = perform_grounding_research
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  # OLD: HTML Scraping (fallback) - uncomment to use
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  # serp_result = perform_serp_research
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_cost += serp_result[:cost]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  if serp_result[:data].nil?
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    fail_article("SERP research failed", total_cost)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(serp_data: serp_result[:data])
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Step 2: Generate Outline
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  outline_result = generate_outline(serp_result[:data])
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_cost += outline_result[:cost]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  if outline_result[:data].nil?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                    fail_article("Outline generation failed", total_cost)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(outline: outline_result[:data])
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Step 3: Write Article
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  writing_result = write_article(outline_result[:data], serp_result[:data])
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_cost += writing_result[:cost]
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  if writing_result[:data].nil?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    fail_article("Article writing failed", total_cost)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(content: writing_result[:data])
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Step 4: Improve Article
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  improvement_result = improve_article(writing_result[:data], serp_result[:data])
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_cost += improvement_result[:cost]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  if improvement_result[:data].nil?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    fail_article("Article improvement failed", total_cost)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(content: improvement_result[:data])
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Calculate final stats
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  word_count = improvement_result[:data].split.size
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract title and meta from outline
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  title = outline_result[:data]['title']
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  meta_description = outline_result[:data]['meta_description']
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  @article.update!(
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: title,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    meta_description: meta_description,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    word_count: word_count,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    generation_cost: total_cost,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: :completed,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed_at: Time.current
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "=" * 80
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "ARTICLE COMPLETE"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Word count: #{word_count}"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "AI cost: $#{total_cost.round(2)}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Duration: #{(Time.current - @article.started_at).round(1)}s"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "=" * 80
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Article generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  fail_article("Unexpected error: #{e.message}", total_cost)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      101.

              # NEW: Google Grounding research

              def write_article(outline, serp_data)

                Rails.logger.info "\n[3/4] Writing Article"

              def improve_article(markdown, serp_data)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "\n[4/4] Improving Article"
          
      140.

                service.perform

              def fail_article(error_message, total_cost)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                @article.update!(
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: :failed,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  error_message: error_message,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  generation_cost: total_cost,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_at: Time.current
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "FAILED: #{error_message}"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            # app/services/article_improvement_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Improves article quality with 5 passes: fix overused examples/stats, remove AI clichs, shorten paragraphs, add depth
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class ArticleImprovementService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # Common AI writing clichs to detect
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              AI_CLICHES = [
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                "in today's digital landscape",
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                "in today's fast-paced world",
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                "it's important to note",
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                "it's worth noting",
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                "in conclusion",
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                "to sum up",
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                "at the end of the day",
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                "game-changer",
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                "revolutionary",
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                "unlock the power",
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                "dive deep",
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                "delve into",
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                "leverage",
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                "utilize",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                "ecosystem",
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                "robust",
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                "seamless",
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                "cutting-edge"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              ].freeze
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              # Shallow/generic advice patterns to detect
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              SHALLOW_PATTERNS = [
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                /create user personas/i,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                /conduct surveys/i,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                /analyze competitors/i,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                /use social media/i,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                /do market research/i,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                /talk to customers/i,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                /build an mvp/i,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                /test your idea/i,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                /validate your concept/i,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                /get feedback/i
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              ].freeze
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(article_markdown, serp_data)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                @article_markdown = article_markdown
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                @serp_data = serp_data
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Improving article quality (5 passes)"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                # Pass 1: Fix overused examples
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                improved = fix_overused_examples(@article_markdown)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                # Pass 2: Fix overused statistics (NEW)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                improved = fix_overused_statistics(improved)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                # Pass 3: Remove AI clichs
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                improved = remove_ai_cliches(improved)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                # Pass 4: Shorten paragraphs
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                improved = shorten_paragraphs(improved)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                # Pass 5: Add depth to shallow content (NEW)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                improved = add_tactical_depth(improved)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Article improved successfully"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                { data: improved, cost: 0.08 } # 5 small GPT-4o Mini calls
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

              # Pass 1: Identify overused company examples and replace with variety
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              def fix_overused_examples(markdown)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Pass 1: Fixing overused examples"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                # Count company mentions
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                examples = @serp_data['detailed_examples'] || []
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                company_counts = Hash.new(0)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                examples.each do |ex|
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  company = ex['company']
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  company_counts[company] += markdown.scan(/#{Regexp.escape(company)}/i).size
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                overused = company_counts.select { |_, count| count > 1 }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                if overused.empty?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No overused examples found"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  return markdown
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Found overused examples: #{overused.keys.join(', ')}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  This article overuses certain company examples. Replace some mentions with different examples.
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  OVERUSED COMPANIES: #{overused.keys.join(', ')}
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  ALTERNATIVE EXAMPLES YOU CAN USE:
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{examples.map { |ex| "- #{ex['company']}: #{ex['what_they_did']}  #{ex['outcome']}" }.join("\n")}
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE:
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{markdown}
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  INSTRUCTIONS:
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Keep the first 1-2 mentions of each overused company
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Replace other mentions with different examples from the list above
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Maintain the same point/argument, just use a different example
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Return the full improved article in markdown
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. DO NOT change anything else - only swap overused examples
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_improvement
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 4000,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118.
