                return markdown unless response[:success]
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Pass 1 failed: #{e.message}"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown # Return original on error
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

              # Pass 2: Remove AI writing clichs
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

              def remove_ai_cliches(markdown)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Pass 2: Removing AI clichs"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                # Detect clichs
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                found_cliches = AI_CLICHES.select { |cliche| markdown.downcase.include?(cliche) }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                if found_cliches.empty?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No AI clichs found"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  return markdown
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Found #{found_cliches.size} AI clichs"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  This article contains AI writing clichs. Rewrite sentences to sound more natural and human.
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  CLICHS TO REMOVE:
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{found_cliches.map { |c| "- \"#{c}\"" }.join("\n")}
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE:
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{markdown}
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  INSTRUCTIONS:
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Find sentences containing these clichs
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Rewrite them to be more natural and conversational
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Keep the same meaning and information
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Don't add corporate jargon or buzzwords
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. Return the full improved article in markdown
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  6. DO NOT change anything else - only fix clichs
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_improvement
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 4000,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                return markdown unless response[:success]
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Pass 2 failed: #{e.message}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown # Return original on error
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

              # Pass 2: Fix overused statistics (NEW)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

              def fix_overused_statistics(markdown)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Pass 2: Fixing overused statistics"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                # Count statistic mentions
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                statistics = @serp_data['statistics'] || []
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                stat_counts = Hash.new(0)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                statistics.each do |stat|
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  stat_text = stat['stat']
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Count how many times this exact stat appears
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  stat_counts[stat_text] += markdown.scan(/#{Regexp.escape(stat_text)}/i).size
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                overused = stat_counts.select { |_, count| count > 1 }
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                if overused.empty?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No overused statistics found"
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  return markdown
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Found overused statistics: #{overused.keys.take(3).join(', ')}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  This article repeats certain statistics multiple times. Keep only the FIRST mention of each stat.
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  OVERUSED STATISTICS:
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{overused.keys.map { |s| "- #{s}" }.join("\n")}
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE:
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{markdown}
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                  INSTRUCTIONS:
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. For each statistic above, keep ONLY the first mention
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Remove all subsequent mentions of the same statistic
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. If a stat is used in multiple contexts, keep the most impactful first use
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Return the full improved article in markdown
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. DO NOT change anything else - only remove duplicate statistics
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_improvement
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 4000,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                return markdown unless response[:success]
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Pass 2 failed: #{e.message}"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown # Return original on error
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

              # Pass 4: Shorten long paragraphs for readability
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

              def shorten_paragraphs(markdown)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Pass 4: Shortening paragraphs"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find paragraphs longer than 5 sentences
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                long_paragraphs = []
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                current_paragraph = []
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown.split("\n").each do |line|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                  if line.strip.empty? || line.start_with?('#')
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                    if current_paragraph.any?
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = current_paragraph.join(" ")
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                      sentence_count = text.scan(/[.!?]+/).size
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                      long_paragraphs << text if sentence_count > 5
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                      current_paragraph = []
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                    current_paragraph << line unless line.start_with?('#')
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                if long_paragraphs.empty?
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No long paragraphs found"
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                  return markdown
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Found #{long_paragraphs.size} long paragraphs"
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                  This article has paragraphs that are too long. Break them into shorter, more readable chunks.
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE:
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{markdown}
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                  INSTRUCTIONS:
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Find paragraphs with more than 4-5 sentences
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Break them into 2-3 smaller paragraphs
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Each paragraph should be 2-4 sentences max
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Maintain logical flow and coherence
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. Don't change the content, just the paragraph structure
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                  6. Return the full improved article in markdown
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                  7. Keep all headings, lists, and formatting intact
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_improvement
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 4000,
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                return markdown unless response[:success]
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Pass 4 failed: #{e.message}"
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown # Return original on error
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

              # Pass 5: Add tactical depth to shallow content (NEW)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

              def add_tactical_depth(markdown)
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Pass 5: Adding tactical depth"
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check for shallow patterns
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                shallow_found = SHALLOW_PATTERNS.any? { |pattern| markdown =~ pattern }
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                unless shallow_found
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No shallow content detected"
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                  return markdown
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Found shallow/generic advice, adding tactical depth"
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                  This article contains generic advice that lacks tactical depth. Transform it into actionable how-to content.
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE:
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{markdown}
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                  INSTRUCTIONS:
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

                  For every generic statement like "conduct surveys" or "create user personas", ADD tactical details:
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

                  BEFORE: "Conduct customer interviews to validate your idea."
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                  AFTER: "Conduct customer interviews to validate your idea. Book 10-15 interviews using these steps:
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Find participants on LinkedIn by searching '[your niche] professional'
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Send this cold outreach: 'Hi [name], I'm researching [problem]. Can I ask 3 quick questions? Takes 10 min.'
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Use this interview script:
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                     - 'Tell me about the last time you experienced [problem]...'
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                     - 'What did you try to solve it?'
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                     - 'If I could solve this perfectly, what would that look like?'
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

                     - 'Would you pay $X/month for that solution?'"
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

                  Add:
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                  - SPECIFIC steps (numbered lists, actual scripts)
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                  - CONCRETE tools/platforms (SurveyMonkey, Typeform, LinkedIn)
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                  - QUANTITATIVE guidance (10-15 interviews, 30+ signups, $X budget)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

                  - EXAMPLE questions, templates, or frameworks
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                  Return the full improved article with added tactical depth.
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                  Keep everything else the same - only expand generic advice into detailed how-tos.
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_improvement
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 5000, # Higher token limit for expansion
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

                return markdown unless response[:success]
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Pass 5 failed: #{e.message}"
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown # Return original on error
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      345.

    app/services/article_outline_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    196 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 196 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/article_outline_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Generates a structured JSON outline for an SEO article based on SERP research
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class ArticleOutlineService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword, serp_data, voice_profile: nil, target_word_count: nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = keyword
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @serp_data = serp_data
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @voice_profile = voice_profile
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @target_word_count = target_word_count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Generating outline for: #{@keyword}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                outline = generate_outline
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                if outline.nil?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Outline generation failed"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  return { data: nil, cost: 0.01 }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Outline generated: #{outline['sections']&.size || 0} sections, #{outline['target_word_count']} words"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                { data: outline, cost: 0.01 } # Gemini 2.5 Flash is very cheap
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate_outline
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                common_topics = @serp_data['common_topics']&.join(', ') || 'general information'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                content_gaps = @serp_data['content_gaps']&.join(', ') || 'unique insights'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                avg_word_count = @serp_data['average_word_count'] || 2000
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use user-provided target_word_count, or calculate based on competitors
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                target_word_count = @target_word_count || [avg_word_count * 1.2, 2000].max.to_i
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get example companies and stats from SERP data
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                examples = @serp_data['detailed_examples'] || []
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                statistics = @serp_data['statistics'] || []
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                examples_preview = examples.take(5).map { |ex|
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- #{ex['company']}: #{ex['what_they_did']}  #{ex['outcome']}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                stats_preview = statistics.take(5).map { |stat|
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- #{stat['stat']} (#{stat['source']})"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                # NEW: Get FAQs, People Also Ask, and internal linking data
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                faqs = @serp_data['faqs'] || []
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                people_also_ask = @serp_data['people_also_ask'] || []
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                internal_links = @serp_data['internal_link_opportunities'] || []
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                cta_placements = @serp_data['cta_placements'] || []
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                faqs_preview = faqs.take(5).map { |faq|
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- Q: #{faq['question']}\n  A: #{faq['answer'][0..100]}..."
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                paa_preview = people_also_ask.take(3).map { |paa|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- #{paa['question']} (suggest as H2: #{paa['should_be_h2_section']})"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                internal_links_preview = internal_links.take(3).map { |link|
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- Link to: \"#{link['target_article_title']}\" (#{link['placement']})"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                cta_preview = cta_placements.take(2).map { |cta|
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- \"#{cta['cta_text']}\"  #{cta['placement']}"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  You are an expert SEO content strategist creating article outlines.
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  TARGET KEYWORD: "#{@keyword}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  COMPETITIVE ANALYSIS:
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Common topics competitors cover: #{common_topics}
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Content gaps to exploit: #{content_gaps}
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Average competitor word count: #{avg_word_count} words
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Your target: #{target_word_count} words (beat them by 20%)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE REAL EXAMPLES:
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{examples_preview.presence || "No examples available"}
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE STATISTICS:
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{stats_preview.presence || "No statistics available"}
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE FAQs (for FAQ section):
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{faqs_preview.presence || "No FAQs available"}
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  PEOPLE ALSO ASK (consider as H2 sections):
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{paa_preview.presence || "No PAA questions available"}
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  INTERNAL LINK OPPORTUNITIES (to existing articles):
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{internal_links_preview.presence || "No internal links available"}
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  CTA PLACEMENTS (project CTAs to include):
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{cta_preview.presence || "No CTAs available"}
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{voice_profile_instructions}
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  Create a comprehensive, SEO-optimized outline that:
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Covers all common topics (to be competitive)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Exploits content gaps (to rank better)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Uses real examples and statistics provided above
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Targets #{target_word_count} words total
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. Has 6-10 main sections (H2 headings)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  6. Each section has 2-4 subsections (H3 headings)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  7. Includes strategic tool placements where interactive elements would add value
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  8. INCLUDES A DEDICATED FAQ SECTION (H2) near the end with 8-12 questions
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  9. Plans internal link placements in relevant sections
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  10. Plans CTA placements at strategic points (not all at once)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  TOOL PLACEMENT GUIDELINES:
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Calculator: for financial/ROI calculations
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Checklist: for step-by-step processes
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Quiz: for self-assessment or knowledge checks
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Comparison: for comparing options/tools
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Only include tools that genuinely add value
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  Format your response as JSON:
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                    "title": "SEO-optimized title with keyword (50-60 chars)",
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    "meta_description": "Compelling meta description with keyword (150-160 chars)",
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    "target_word_count": #{target_word_count},
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    "has_faq_section": true,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    "faq_section_index": 7,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    "sections": [
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                        "heading": "Section heading (H2)",
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                        "word_count": 400,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                        "key_points": ["point 1", "point 2", "point 3"],
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                        "subsections": [
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                          {
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                            "heading": "Subsection heading (H3)",
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                            "word_count": 200,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                            "key_points": ["specific point 1", "specific point 2"]
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                        ],
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                        "internal_links": [
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                          {
          
      141.

                            "anchor_text": "customer interview best practices",
          
      142.

      143.

                            "context": "Mention in subsection about validation methods"
          
      144.

                          }
          
      145.

      146.

      147.

                      "heading": "Frequently Asked Questions",

                      "questions_to_include": [
          
      152.

                        "How many customer interviews do I need?",
          
      153.

      155.

                    },

                    "tool_placements": [

      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  IMPORTANT:
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Make the outline comprehensive enough to reach #{target_word_count} words
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include an Introduction section (200-300 words)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include a FAQ section near the end (before Conclusion)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include a Conclusion section (200-300 words)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Distribute word count evenly across sections
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use specific, actionable section headings
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Reference the real examples and stats provided above in your key_points
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Plan internal link placements in sections where they're contextually relevant
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Space out CTA placements (don't put them all in one place)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Consider People Also Ask questions as potential H2 section topics
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_outline_generation
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 8000, # Increased from 4000 to handle larger outlines
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless response[:success]
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                json_str = extract_json(response[:content])
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                if json_str.nil?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "No JSON found in response"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  return nil
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                outline = JSON.parse(json_str)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                # Validate outline structure
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                unless outline['sections'].is_a?(Array) && outline['sections'].size >= 4
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Invalid outline: insufficient sections"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  return nil
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                # Ensure has_faq_section is set (for backward compatibility with old outlines)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                outline['has_faq_section'] ||= outline.key?('faq_section')
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                outline
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to parse outline JSON: #{e.message}"
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "JSON string (first 500 chars): #{json_str[0..500]}" if json_str
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "AI Response (first 1000 chars): #{response[:content][0..1000]}" if response
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Outline generation error: #{e.message}"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(3).join("\n")
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

              def voice_profile_instructions
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                return "" unless @voice_profile.present?
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                <<~VOICE
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  VOICE PROFILE:
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230.
