            # app/services/competitor_analysis_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Analyzes competitor websites for keyword opportunities
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class CompetitorAnalysisService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              USER_AGENT = "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; VerySimpleSEO/1.0)"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(project)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @project = project
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def analyze_all
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = []
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                @project.competitors.each do |competitor|
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Analyzing competitor: #{competitor.domain}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Scrape sitemap for page URLs
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  sitemap_keywords = scrape_sitemap(competitor.domain)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords.concat(sitemap_keywords.map { |kw| { keyword: kw, source: competitor.domain } })
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Scrape key pages for titles/H1s
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  page_keywords = scrape_pages(competitor.domain)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords.concat(page_keywords.map { |kw| { keyword: kw, source: competitor.domain } })
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  sleep 1 # Be nice to competitors
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              def scrape_sitemap(domain)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Scraping sitemap for: #{domain}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                sitemap_urls = [
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/sitemap.xml",
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/sitemap.xml.gz",
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/sitemap_index.xml",
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/sitemap_index.xml.gz",
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://www.#{domain}/sitemap.xml",
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://www.#{domain}/sitemap.xml.gz"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = []
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                sitemap_urls.each do |sitemap_url|
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    uri = URI(sitemap_url)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    request["User-Agent"] = USER_AGENT
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.hostname, uri.port, use_ssl: true, open_timeout: 5, read_timeout: 10) do |http|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                      http.request(request)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless response.code == '200'
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Decompress if gzipped
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    content = if sitemap_url.end_with?('.gz')
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                                decompress_gzip(response.body)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                                response.body
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    xml = Nokogiri::XML(content)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Extract URLs from sitemap
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                    urls = xml.xpath('//xmlns:loc').map(&:text)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Convert URLs to keywords
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                    urls.each do |url|
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Extract path segment: "https://example.com/validate-startup-idea"  "validate startup idea"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                      path = URI(url).path
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                      segments = path.split('/').reject(&:empty?)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                      segments.each do |segment|
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                        keyword = segment.gsub(/[-_]/, ' ').downcase
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                        keywords << keyword if keyword.length > 5 && keyword.length < 100
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Found #{urls.size} pages in sitemap"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    break # Found a working sitemap
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue => e
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Try next sitemap URL
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                    next
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.warn "No sitemap found for #{domain}" if keywords.empty?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.uniq
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

              def scrape_pages(domain)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Scraping key pages for: #{domain}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = []
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                urls_to_check = [
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}",
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/features",
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/pricing",
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://#{domain}/blog"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                urls_to_check.each do |url|
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                    uri = URI(url)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    request["User-Agent"] = USER_AGENT
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.hostname, uri.port, use_ssl: true, open_timeout: 5, read_timeout: 10) do |http|
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      http.request(request)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless response.code == '200'
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    doc = Nokogiri::HTML(response.body)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Extract title tag
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    title = doc.at_css('title')&.text
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                    keywords << title.downcase if title && title.length < 100
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Extract H1s
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                    h1s = doc.css('h1').map(&:text).map(&:downcase)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    keywords.concat(h1s.select { |h| h.length > 5 && h.length < 100 })
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Extract H2s (might contain keyword phrases)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    h2s = doc.css('h2').map(&:text).map(&:downcase)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    keywords.concat(h2s.select { |h| h.length > 5 && h.length < 100 })
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Extract meta description
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                    meta_desc = doc.at_css('meta[name="description"]')
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    keywords << meta_desc['content'].downcase if meta_desc && meta_desc['content']
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue => e
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Page failed, continue to next
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    next
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139.

                Rails.logger.info "Found #{keywords.size} keywords from pages" if keywords.any?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.compact.uniq
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142.

              def decompress_gzip(gzipped_content)

      147.

    148.

              def parse_sitemap(xml_content)

    111. 
            

            
              
            

                doc = Nokogiri::XML(xml_content)

      113.

                # Extract all URLs from sitemap

                urls = doc.css('url loc').map(&:text)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116.

                # Convert URLs to potential keywords

                # Extract path segments that look like content topics

    119.

    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get last path segment, clean it up
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  path = uri.path.split('/').reject(&:empty?).last
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  next unless path
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Convert to readable keyword
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  path.gsub(/[-_]/, ' ').strip
          
      126.

                end.compact.uniq.first(20)

              def build_content_summary

                  else: 0

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                parts << "Topics covered: #{@results[:h2s].first(5).join(', ')}" if @results[:h2s].any?

              def fetch_with_retry(uri, max_retries: 2)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                retries = 0
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  http.use_ssl = (uri.scheme == 'https')
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  http.open_timeout = 10
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  http.read_timeout = 10
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  request['User-Agent'] = 'VerySimpleSEO Bot (SEO Content Analysis)'
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  response = http.request(request)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if response.code == '200'
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    response
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "HTTP #{response.code} for #{uri}"
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    nil
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue Net::OpenTimeout, Net::ReadTimeout => e
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  retries += 1
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if retries <= max_retries
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Timeout fetching #{uri}, retry #{retries}/#{max_retries}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    sleep(2 ** retries) # Exponential backoff
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    retry
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch #{uri} after #{max_retries} retries: #{e.message}"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    nil
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error fetching #{uri}: #{e.message}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      179.

            # Google Ads API Service for Keyword Research
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            # Fetches real search volume, CPC, and competition data using official gem
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            # Note: Google Ads gem is loaded in config/initializers/google_ads.rb
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            class GoogleAdsService
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # Google Ads API requires OAuth setup
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              # Follow setup guide: https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api/docs/first-call/overview
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                @client = nil
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                @customer_id = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_CUSTOMER_ID"]&.gsub(/[^0-9]/, '')
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              def get_keyword_metrics(keywords, location: 'United States', language: 'English')
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Keywords can be array or single keyword
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = [ keywords ] unless keywords.is_a?(Array)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                if !credentials_present?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  puts "    Google Ads API not configured (using heuristics)"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  return nil
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Initialize client if needed
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  initialize_client unless @client
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Google Ads API only supports 20 keywords per request
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Batch keywords into groups of 20
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_metrics = {}
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords.each_slice(20).with_index do |keyword_batch, index|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Add delay between batches to avoid rate limiting (except for first batch)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    sleep(5) if index > 0
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Call Google Ads API with retry logic for rate limits
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    retries = 0
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                    max_retries = 3
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                      results = fetch_keyword_ideas(keyword_batch, location: location, language: language)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Parse and merge metrics
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                      batch_metrics = parse_keyword_metrics(results)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                      all_metrics.merge!(batch_metrics) if batch_metrics
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue Google::Ads::GoogleAds::Errors::GoogleAdsError => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if it's a rate limit error
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                      if e.failure&.errors&.any? { |err| err.error_code.error_code == :quota_error }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                        retries += 1
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                        if retries <= max_retries
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                          wait_time = 5 * retries # Exponential backoff: 5s, 10s, 15s
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                          Rails.logger.warn "Rate limit hit, retrying batch #{index + 1} in #{wait_time} seconds (attempt #{retries}/#{max_retries})"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                          sleep(wait_time)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                          retry
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                          Rails.logger.error "Rate limit exceeded after #{max_retries} retries for batch #{index + 1}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                          raise # Re-raise to trigger outer exception handler
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                        raise # Re-raise non-rate-limit errors
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_metrics.empty? ? nil : all_metrics
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue Google::Ads::GoogleAds::Errors::GoogleAdsError => e
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  puts "    Google Ads API error: #{e.message}"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Google Ads API error: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Log all error details
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  if e.failure
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    e.failure.errors.each do |error|
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "  Error code: #{error.error_code.error_code}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "  Message: #{error.message}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "  Trigger: #{error.trigger&.string_value}"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      puts "    Error: #{error.error_code.error_code} - #{error.message}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  puts "    Unexpected error: #{e.message}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Unexpected error in GoogleAdsService: #{e.class} - #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.first(10).join("\n")}"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      89.

      90.

              private
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91.

              def credentials_present?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_DEVELOPER_TOKEN"] &&
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_ID"] &&
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_SECRET"] &&
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_REFRESH_TOKEN"] &&
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                @customer_id
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize_client
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                # Configure the client using environment variables
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                Google::Ads::GoogleAds::Config.new do |c|
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  c.client_id = ENV['GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_ID']
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  c.client_secret = ENV['GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_SECRET']
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  c.refresh_token = ENV['GOOGLE_ADS_REFRESH_TOKEN']
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  c.developer_token = ENV['GOOGLE_ADS_DEVELOPER_TOKEN']
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  c.login_customer_id = @customer_id
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                @client = Google::Ads::GoogleAds::GoogleAdsClient.new
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_keyword_ideas(keywords, location: 'United States', language: 'English')
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                keyword_plan_idea_service = @client.service.keyword_plan_idea
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build the keyword seed using the client's resource factory
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                keyword_seed = @client.resource.keyword_seed do |ks|
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  ks.keywords += keywords
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                # Map location and language to Google constants
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                # TODO: Make these configurable/dynamic
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                geo_target = geo_target_constant_for_location(location)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                language_constant = language_constant_for_language(language)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate keyword ideas
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                response = keyword_plan_idea_service.generate_keyword_ideas(
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  customer_id: @customer_id,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  language: @client.path.language_constant(language_constant),
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  geo_target_constants: [@client.path.geo_target_constant(geo_target)],
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword_plan_network: :GOOGLE_SEARCH,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword_seed: keyword_seed
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                # Convert to array since it's a PagedEnumerable
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                response.to_a
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_keyword_metrics(results)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                metrics = {}
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                results.each do |result|
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword = result.text
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  next unless keyword
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract metrics
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword_metrics = result.keyword_idea_metrics
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  next unless keyword_metrics
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Monthly search volume (average over last 12 months)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume = keyword_metrics.avg_monthly_searches || 0
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Competition level (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  competition = keyword_metrics.competition || :UNSPECIFIED
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Competition index (0-100)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  competition_index = keyword_metrics.competition_index || 50
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  # CPC bid ranges (in micros, need to divide by 1,000,000)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  low_cpc = (keyword_metrics.low_top_of_page_bid_micros || 0) / 1_000_000.0
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  high_cpc = (keyword_metrics.high_top_of_page_bid_micros || 0) / 1_000_000.0
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  avg_cpc = (low_cpc + high_cpc) / 2.0
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  metrics[keyword.downcase] = {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    volume: volume,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    competition_level: competition.to_s,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    difficulty: competition_index, # 0-100 scale
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    cpc: avg_cpc.round(2)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                metrics
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              # Map location names to Google Ads geo target constants
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

              def geo_target_constant_for_location(location)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                case location.downcase
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                when 'united states', 'us', 'usa'
          
      179.

                  2840
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180.

                  2826

              def language_constant_for_language(language)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                case language.downcase
          
      194.

                when 'english', 'en'

            # app/services/google_grounding_service.rb
