              def build_linking_guidelines
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                <<~GUIDELINES
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  Internal Linking Rules:
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Link to existing articles when naturally relevant
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Use descriptive anchor text (not "click here")
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Place 3-5 internal links per article
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Link early in article (first 500 words)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. Use project CTAs 1-2 times maximum
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  6. Prioritize recent/relevant articles over old ones
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  7. Don't force links - only when contextually appropriate
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                GUIDELINES
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              def extract_topics_from_article(article)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract key topics from article content
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                # Simple approach: extract H2 headings from outline
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                return [] unless article.outline.present?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                sections = article.outline['sections'] || []
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                sections.map { |s| s['heading'] }.compact
          
      71.

              end
          
      72.

              def infer_cta_context(cta)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                # Infer what the CTA is for based on text/URL
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                text = cta['text'].to_s.downcase
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                url = cta['url'].to_s.downcase
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?('sign up') || text.include?('signup') || url.include?('signup')
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  'user_registration'
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif text.include?('demo') || url.include?('demo')
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  'product_demo'
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif text.include?('pricing') || url.include?('pricing')
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  'pricing_page'
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif text.include?('download') || text.include?('get') && text.include?('free')
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  'free_resource'
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif text.include?('contact') || url.include?('contact')
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  'contact_sales'
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif text.include?('trial') || text.include?('free') || url.include?('trial')
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  'free_trial'
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  'general_cta'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

              def article_url(article)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate URL for article
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                # This assumes articles are at /articles/:id or similar
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                # Adjust based on your routing
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                "/articles/#{article.id}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            end

    app/services/keyword_clustering_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    80 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 80 lines missed.

    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/keyword_clustering_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Clusters similar keywords together to avoid duplicate content
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            # Groups "business ai tool" and "business ai tools" into one cluster
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            class KeywordClusteringService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Minimum similarity to consider keywords as duplicates
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD = 0.85 # High threshold - only cluster very similar keywords
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keywords_with_data)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # keywords_with_data is a hash: { "keyword" => { volume: 100, difficulty: 50, ... } }
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                @keywords_with_data = keywords_with_data
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                @similarity_service = SemanticSimilarityService.new
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              # Cluster keywords and return best representative from each cluster
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              # Returns: { "keyword" => { ...data..., cluster_size: 3 } }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              def cluster_and_select_best
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                return {} if @keywords_with_data.empty?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Clustering #{@keywords_with_data.size} keywords..."
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 1: Calculate pairwise similarities between all keywords
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                clusters = build_clusters
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # Step 2: Select best keyword from each cluster
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                best_keywords = select_best_from_clusters(clusters)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Clustered into #{clusters.size} groups, selected #{best_keywords.size} representatives"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                best_keywords
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_clusters
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = @keywords_with_data.keys
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                return [] if keywords.empty?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                # Start with each keyword in its own cluster
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                clusters = keywords.map { |kw| [kw] }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get embeddings for all keywords at once (efficient batch processing)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                embeddings_map = {}
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.each_slice(2000) do |batch|
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  batch_embeddings = @similarity_service.batch_embed(batch)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  batch.each_with_index do |kw, i|
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    embeddings_map[kw] = batch_embeddings[i]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # Merge similar clusters iteratively
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                merged = true
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                iterations = 0
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                max_iterations = 100 # Prevent infinite loops
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                while merged && iterations < max_iterations
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  merged = false
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  iterations += 1
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Try to merge clusters
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  i = 0
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  while i < clusters.size
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    j = i + 1
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    while j < clusters.size
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if any keyword in cluster i is similar to any in cluster j
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                      if clusters_similar?(clusters[i], clusters[j], embeddings_map)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Merge cluster j into cluster i
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                        clusters[i].concat(clusters[j])
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                        clusters.delete_at(j)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                        merged = true
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                        j += 1
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    i += 1
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Clustering converged after #{iterations} iterations"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                clusters
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

              # Check if two clusters have any keywords that are very similar
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

              def clusters_similar?(cluster1, cluster2, embeddings_map)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                # For efficiency, just check first keyword of each cluster
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                # (since keywords in same cluster are already similar)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                kw1 = cluster1.first
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                kw2 = cluster2.first
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                embedding1 = embeddings_map[kw1]
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                embedding2 = embeddings_map[kw2]
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                return false if embedding1.nil? || embedding2.nil?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity = @similarity_service.send(:cosine_similarity, embedding1, embedding2)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity >= SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

              def select_best_from_clusters(clusters)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                best_keywords = {}
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                clusters.each do |cluster|
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Select best keyword from this cluster based on:
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  # 1. Highest volume (most important)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  # 2. Highest opportunity (if volume is similar)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  # 3. Shortest keyword (tiebreaker - more focused)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  best_keyword = cluster.max_by do |kw|
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                    data = @keywords_with_data[kw]
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    volume = data[:volume] || 0
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    opportunity = data[:opportunity] || 0
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    length_penalty = -kw.length * 0.01 # Slight preference for shorter keywords
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Score: volume is most important, opportunity breaks ties
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    (volume * 1000) + opportunity + length_penalty
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add cluster metadata
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  best_data = @keywords_with_data[best_keyword].dup
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  best_data[:cluster_size] = cluster.size
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  best_data[:cluster_keywords] = cluster - [best_keyword] # Other keywords in cluster
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  best_keywords[best_keyword] = best_data
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  if cluster.size > 1
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "  Cluster (#{cluster.size}): #{best_keyword}  [#{cluster[1..3].join(', ')}#{cluster.size > 4 ? '...' : ''}]"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                best_keywords
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      132.

    app/services/keyword_metrics_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    121 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 121 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/keyword_metrics_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Estimates keyword metrics (volume, difficulty, CPC) using heuristics
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            # Optionally uses Google Ads API for real metrics when configured
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            class KeywordMetricsService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword, use_google_ads: false)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = keyword.downcase.strip
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @use_google_ads = use_google_ads
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def calculate
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Try Google Ads API first if enabled
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                if @use_google_ads
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  real_metrics = fetch_google_ads_metrics
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  return real_metrics if real_metrics
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fall back to heuristics
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume: estimate_volume,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  difficulty: estimate_difficulty,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  cpc: estimate_cpc,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  intent: determine_intent,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  opportunity: nil # Will be calculated after metrics are set
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              # Class method for batch fetching from Google Ads API
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.calculate_batch(keywords, use_google_ads: false)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                if use_google_ads
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  google_ads = GoogleAdsService.new
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  real_metrics = google_ads.get_keyword_metrics(keywords)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  if real_metrics
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Return real metrics for each keyword
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    return keywords.map do |kw|
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      kw_lower = kw.downcase.strip
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                      if real_metrics[kw_lower]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                        {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                          keyword: kw_lower,
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                          volume: real_metrics[kw_lower][:volume],
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                          difficulty: real_metrics[kw_lower][:difficulty],
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                          cpc: real_metrics[kw_lower][:cpc],
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                          intent: new(kw_lower).send(:determine_intent),
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                          opportunity: nil
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Fall back to heuristics for this keyword
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                        new(kw_lower).calculate.merge(keyword: kw_lower)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fall back to heuristics for all keywords
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.map { |kw| new(kw).calculate.merge(keyword: kw.downcase.strip) }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.calculate_opportunity(metrics, semantic_similarity: nil)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                # Multi-factor opportunity score balancing:
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                # - Volume (40%): Traffic potential, capped at 2000 to prevent mega-volume dominance
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                # - Difficulty (30%): Ranking feasibility (inverted: easier = higher score)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                # - Semantic Relevance (30%): Domain fit (prioritizes relevant keywords)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                # Return nil if we don't have the required metrics
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless metrics[:volume] && metrics[:difficulty]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                # Factor 1: Volume Score (0-40 points)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                # Cap at 2000 so mega-volume keywords don't max out
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                volume_score = normalize(metrics[:volume], max: 2000) * 0.4
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                # Factor 2: Difficulty Score (0-30 points)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                # Invert: easier = higher score
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty_score = (100 - metrics[:difficulty]) * 0.3
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                # Factor 3: Semantic Relevance Score (0-30 points)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                # Higher relevance to domain = higher score
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                relevance_score = semantic_similarity ? (semantic_similarity * 30) : 0
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                # Base opportunity
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity = volume_score + difficulty_score + relevance_score
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                # Smart Penalty: Mega-volume + low relevance = generic keyword
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                # Catches keywords like "ai tools", "business ideas" that have high volume but aren't specific to domain
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                if metrics[:volume] > 10000 && semantic_similarity && semantic_similarity < 0.4
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  opportunity -= 20
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "    Penalized mega-volume low-relevance: #{metrics[:keyword]} (vol: #{metrics[:volume]}, sim: #{semantic_similarity.round(3)})"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                # Penalty: Ultra-low volume keywords
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity -= 20 if metrics[:volume] < 50
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Bonus: Commercial intent (more likely to convert)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity += 10 if metrics[:intent] == "commercial"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity += 5 if ["informational", "educational"].include?(metrics[:intent])
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                [[opportunity, 0].max, 100].min.round
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_google_ads_metrics
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                google_ads = GoogleAdsService.new
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                real_metrics = google_ads.get_keyword_metrics([@keyword])
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless real_metrics && real_metrics[@keyword]
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume: real_metrics[@keyword][:volume],
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  difficulty: real_metrics[@keyword][:difficulty],
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  cpc: real_metrics[@keyword][:cpc],
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  intent: determine_intent,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  opportunity: nil
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Google Ads API error for keyword '#{@keyword}': #{e.message}"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

              def estimate_volume
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                # Simple heuristic based on keyword characteristics
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                base = 100
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                # Shorter keywords = higher volume usually
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                base += (50 - @keyword.split.size * 10) if @keyword.split.size <= 5
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                # Common topics
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 200 if @keyword.include?("seo") || @keyword.include?("marketing")
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 150 if @keyword.include?("startup") || @keyword.include?("business")
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 100 if @keyword.include?("content") || @keyword.include?("article")
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                # Question keywords = medium volume
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 50 if @keyword.start_with?("how to", "what is", "why", "when")
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                # Long-tail = lower volume
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                base -= @keyword.split.size * 20 if @keyword.split.size > 4
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                # Tool/product keywords
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 100 if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software") || @keyword.include?("generator")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                # Free = higher volume
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 80 if @keyword.include?("free")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                # Template/checklist = moderate volume
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 60 if @keyword.include?("template") || @keyword.include?("checklist")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                [base, 10].max # Minimum 10
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              def estimate_difficulty
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                # Estimate how hard it is to rank (0 = easy, 100 = impossible)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty = 50 # Start at medium
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                # Shorter keywords = harder
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += (5 - @keyword.split.size) * 10 if @keyword.split.size < 5
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                # Competitive terms
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += 20 if @keyword.include?("best")
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += 15 if @keyword.split.size <= 2 # Very broad
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 15 if @keyword.split.size >= 5 # Long-tail = easier
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                # Question keywords = easier (less competitive)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 10 if @keyword.start_with?("how to", "what is", "why")
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                # Tool/product = competitive
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += 10 if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software")
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                # Specific modifiers = easier
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 5 if @keyword.include?("free")
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 10 if @keyword.include?("template") || @keyword.include?("checklist")
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                # Very specific = easier
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 15 if @keyword.split.size >= 6
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                [[difficulty, 0].max, 100].min # Clamp between 0-100
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              def estimate_cpc
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                # Rough CPC estimate (in reality, use Google Keyword Planner)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc = 1.50
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 1.0 if @keyword.include?("startup") || @keyword.include?("business") || @keyword.include?("marketing")
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 0.50 if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software")
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc -= 0.75 if @keyword.include?("free")
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 0.25 if @keyword.include?("best")
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 0.50 if @keyword.include?("seo")
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                [base_cpc, 0.10].max.round(2)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

              def determine_intent
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                # What is the user trying to do?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                return "navigational" if @keyword.include?("login") || @keyword.include?("sign up")
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                return "commercial" if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software") || @keyword.include?("best")
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                return "transactional" if @keyword.include?("free") || @keyword.include?("online") || @keyword.include?("template")
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                return "informational" if @keyword.start_with?("how to", "what is", "why", "when")
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                return "educational" if @keyword.include?("guide") || @keyword.include?("tutorial") || @keyword.include?("framework")
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                "mixed"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.normalize(value, max:)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                # Normalize value to 0-100 scale, clamping at max
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                normalized = ((value.to_f / max) * 100).round
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                [normalized, 100].min # Cap at 100
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      208.

    app/services/keyword_relevance_filter.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    136 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 136 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/keyword_relevance_filter.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Filters keywords by relevance to project's domain using AI
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class KeywordRelevanceFilter
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(project)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @project = project
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @domain_context = build_domain_context
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              # Filter a batch of keywords for relevance
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              # Processes in batches to avoid token limits
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              # Returns hash of { keyword => confidence_level }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              def filter_with_confidence(keywords)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                return {} if keywords.empty?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Filtering #{keywords.size} keywords for relevance..."
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Process in batches of 200 keywords at a time to avoid token limits
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                batch_size = 200
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                all_keywords_with_confidence = {}
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.each_slice(batch_size).with_index do |keyword_batch, index|
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "  Processing batch #{index + 1} (#{keyword_batch.size} keywords)..."
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build prompt with domain context and keywords to filter
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  prompt = build_filter_prompt(keyword_batch)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = Ai::ClientService.for_keyword_analysis
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = client.chat(
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    system_prompt: "You are an expert at determining keyword relevance for SEO content strategy.",
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    max_tokens: 2000,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    temperature: 0.2  # Low temperature for consistent filtering
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless response[:success]
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "AI filtering failed for batch #{index + 1}, assuming medium confidence for all"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    keyword_batch.each { |kw| all_keywords_with_confidence[kw] = "medium" }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    next
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Parse the response to get keywords with confidence levels
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  batch_results = parse_keywords_with_confidence(response[:content], keyword_batch)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.
