                  all_keywords_with_confidence.merge!(batch_results)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  high_count = batch_results.count { |_, conf| conf == "high" }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  medium_count = batch_results.count { |_, conf| conf == "medium" }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  low_count = batch_results.count { |_, conf| conf == "low" }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "  Batch #{index + 1}: #{high_count} high, #{medium_count} medium, #{low_count} low confidence"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Filter results: #{all_keywords_with_confidence.count { |_, c| c == 'high' }} high, #{all_keywords_with_confidence.count { |_, c| c == 'medium' }} medium, #{all_keywords_with_confidence.count { |_, c| c == 'low' }} low"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                all_keywords_with_confidence
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              # Legacy method for backward compatibility
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

              # Returns array of keywords (high + medium confidence)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              def filter(keywords)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                results = filter_with_confidence(keywords)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                results.select { |_, conf| conf == "high" || conf == "medium" }.keys
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_domain_context
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_analysis = @project.domain_analysis || {}
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  domain: @project.domain,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  name: @project.name,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  niche: @project.niche,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  description: @project.description,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  title: domain_analysis[:title],
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  h1s: domain_analysis[:h1s]&.first(3)&.join(", "),
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  h2s: domain_analysis[:h2s]&.first(5)&.join(", ")
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_filter_prompt(keywords)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords_list = keywords.map.with_index { |kw, i| "#{i + 1}. #{kw}" }.join("\n")
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  I need to filter keywords for relevance to this website using a THREE-TIER confidence system:
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  DOMAIN: #{@domain_context[:domain]}
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  NAME: #{@domain_context[:name]}
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  NICHE: #{@domain_context[:niche]}
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  DESCRIPTION: #{@domain_context[:description]}
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  PAGE TITLE: #{@domain_context[:title]}
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  MAIN TOPICS (H1s): #{@domain_context[:h1s]}
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  CONTENT TOPICS (H2s): #{@domain_context[:h2s]}
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  KEYWORDS TO FILTER:
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{keywords_list}
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  YOUR TASK:
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  Classify each keyword into one of three confidence levels:
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                   HIGH CONFIDENCE - Core keywords that directly match what this site does:
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Keywords that describe the EXACT solution/service offered
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Keywords matching the MAIN problems the site solves (based on H1s, title, description)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Keywords about the core PROCESS/METHODOLOGY provided
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Users searching these terms are CLEARLY the target audience
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                   MEDIUM CONFIDENCE - Adjacent topics that relate to the customer journey:
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Keywords from one step BEFORE or AFTER the core solution
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Related topics that the target persona might also search for
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Tangentially related but could write authentic content with natural product bridge
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Same persona, slightly different need
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                   LOW CONFIDENCE - Remove these:
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Generic industry terms with no connection to specific solution
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Keywords targeting completely different personas
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Different service categories or trade types
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Different stage of journey with no logical connection
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Topics where content bridge would feel forced
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  EVALUATION QUESTIONS (ask for each keyword):
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Does this target the SAME PERSON who would use this site?
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Is this part of the PROBLEM/SOLUTION JOURNEY this site addresses?
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Could you write AUTHENTIC content that naturally bridges to this site's offering?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  - YES to all 3  HIGH confidence
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  - YES to 2  MEDIUM confidence
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  - YES to 1  LOW confidence
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  Return ONLY a JSON object mapping keyword numbers to confidence levels:
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    "high": ["1", "5", "12"],
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                    "medium": ["3", "7", "19"],
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    "low": ["2", "4", "8"]
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  Be thoughtful but not overly strict. High = 30-40%, Medium = 20-30%, Low = 30-50%.
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_keywords_with_confidence(response, original_keywords)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract JSON object from response
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                json_str = response[/\{.*?\}/m]
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fallback: assume medium confidence for all
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                unless json_str
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  return original_keywords.each_with_object({}) { |kw, hash| hash[kw] = "medium" }
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  confidence_tiers = JSON.parse(json_str)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get indices for each confidence level
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  high_indices = (confidence_tiers["high"] || []).map(&:to_i)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  medium_indices = (confidence_tiers["medium"] || []).map(&:to_i)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  low_indices = (confidence_tiers["low"] || []).map(&:to_i)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Map keywords to their confidence levels
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword_confidence = {}
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  high_indices.each do |idx|
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                    kw = original_keywords[idx - 1]
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                    keyword_confidence[kw] = "high" if kw
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  medium_indices.each do |idx|
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    kw = original_keywords[idx - 1]
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    keyword_confidence[kw] = "medium" if kw
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  low_indices.each do |idx|
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                    kw = original_keywords[idx - 1]
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    keyword_confidence[kw] = "low" if kw
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  # If AI didn't classify some keywords, assume medium confidence
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  original_keywords.each do |kw|
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                    keyword_confidence[kw] ||= "medium"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword_confidence
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to parse relevance filter response: #{e.message}"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Response was: #{response}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Fallback: medium confidence for all
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  original_keywords.each_with_object({}) { |kw, hash| hash[kw] = "medium" }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

              # Legacy parsing method for backward compatibility
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_relevant_keywords(response, original_keywords)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                results = parse_keywords_with_confidence(response, original_keywords)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                results.select { |_, conf| conf == "high" || conf == "medium" }.keys
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      193.

    app/services/keyword_research_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    358 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 358 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed.

            # app/services/keyword_research_service.rb
          
      2.

            # Main orchestration service for keyword research
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class KeywordResearchService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # Thresholds for filtering
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD = 0.40 # Minimum semantic similarity (raised from 0.30 to filter wrong tool categories)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword_research)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research = keyword_research
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @project = keyword_research.project
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                @keywords = {}
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_similarities = {} # Store semantic similarity scores for opportunity calculation
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting keyword research for project: #{@project.name}"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # NEW FLOW: Competitors inform seeds
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                # 1. Scrape YOUR domain (if not cached)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                scrape_domain
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                # 2. Discover and scrape competitors (Grounding)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                discover_and_scrape_competitors
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # 3. Generate seed keywords (using competitor insights)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                generate_seed_keywords
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                # 4. Expand via Google autocomplete, PAA, related searches
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                expand_keywords
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                # 5. Mine Reddit topics (DISABLED - too noisy, creates ultra long-tail keywords with no volume)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # mine_reddit
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                # 6. Scrape competitor sitemaps and pages (additional source)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                analyze_competitors
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                # 7. Calculate metrics (heuristics or Google Ads API)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                calculate_metrics
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                # 8. Save top keywords to database (with filters)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                save_keywords
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                # 9. Mark research as completed
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research.update!(
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: :completed,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_keywords_found: @keywords.size,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_at: Time.current
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Keyword research completed. Found #{@keywords.size} keywords, saved top keywords."
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

              # Step 1: Scrape YOUR domain (if not already cached)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              def scrape_domain
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                return if @project.domain_analysis.present?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 1: Scraping YOUR domain for content analysis..."
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                service = DomainAnalysisService.new(@project.domain)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_data = service.analyze
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_data && !domain_data[:error]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  @project.update(domain_analysis: domain_data)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Domain analysis cached for future use"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Failed to scrape domain, will use fallback context"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

              # Step 2: Discover and scrape competitors using Grounding
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              def discover_and_scrape_competitors
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 2: Discovering and scrape competitors with Grounding..."
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                # Skip if user manually added competitors
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                if @project.competitors.any?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Using #{@project.competitors.count} user-provided competitors"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor_domains = @project.competitors.pluck(:domain)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build rich context from domain analysis
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  domain_data = @project.domain_analysis || {}
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use Grounding to discover competitors with rich context
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  grounding = GoogleGroundingService.new
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build detailed query with actual business description
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  query = build_competitor_discovery_query(domain_data)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Grounding query: #{query[0..200]}..."
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  json_structure = [
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    "competitor1.com",
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                    "competitor2.com",
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    "competitor3.com"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  ].to_json
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  result = grounding.search_json(query, json_structure_hint: json_structure)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  if result[:success]
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    competitor_domains = parse_competitor_domains(result[:data])
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Discovered #{competitor_domains.size} competitors via Grounding"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Log what was found for debugging
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    competitor_domains.first(5).each do |domain|
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "  - #{domain}"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Grounding competitor discovery failed: #{result[:error]}"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    competitor_domains = []
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                # Scrape discovered competitors
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                @competitor_data = []
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                competitor_domains.first(10).each do |domain|
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "  Scraping #{domain}..."
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  service = DomainAnalysisService.new(domain)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  data = service.analyze
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  if data && !data[:error]
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                    @competitor_data << data
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  sleep 1 # Be nice to servers
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Scraped #{@competitor_data.size} competitors successfully"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate_seed_keywords
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 3: Generating seed keywords..."
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use project.seed_keywords if user provided them, otherwise generate
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                if @project.seed_keywords.present? && @project.seed_keywords.any?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Using #{@project.seed_keywords.size} user-provided seed keywords"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds = @project.seed_keywords
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Generating seed keywords from domain + competitor insights..."
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract competitor domains (not scraped data)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor_domains = @competitor_data.map { |c| c[:url] || c[:domain] }.compact rescue []
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  generator = SeedKeywordGenerator.new(@project)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds = generator.generate_with_competitors(competitor_domains)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                # Store seeds in keyword_research record
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research.update!(seed_keywords: seeds)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate semantic similarity for seed keywords (for opportunity scoring)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_context = build_domain_context
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity_service = SemanticSimilarityService.new
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                seed_similarities = similarity_service.batch_similarity(domain_context, seeds)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                # Store seed similarities
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                seed_similarities.each do |result|
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  @keyword_similarities[result[:keyword]] = result[:similarity]
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add each seed to our keywords hash
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                seeds.each { |seed| add_keyword(seed, source: "seed") }
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Using #{seeds.size} seed keywords"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

              def expand_keywords
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 2: Expanding keywords..."
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                all_expanded = []
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                google_ads_suggestions = [] # Track Google Ads API suggestions separately
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research.seed_keywords.each do |seed|
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "  Expanding: #{seed}"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Google Ads API keyword suggestions (BEST - includes metrics + variations)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  if ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_DEVELOPER_TOKEN"].present?
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                    google_ads = GoogleAdsService.new
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    ads_metrics = google_ads.get_keyword_metrics([seed])
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                    if ads_metrics
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Extract just the keywords from the metrics hash
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                      ads_keywords = ads_metrics.keys
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                      google_ads_suggestions.concat(ads_keywords)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "    Google Ads API: #{ads_keywords.size} suggestions"
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Google autocomplete suggestions
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  suggestions = GoogleSuggestionsService.new(seed).fetch
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_expanded.concat(suggestions)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  # SERP scraping (PAA + Related Searches)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  serp_scraper = SerpScraperService.new(seed)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                  paa = serp_scraper.scrape_people_also_ask
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_expanded.concat(paa)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                  related = serp_scraper.scrape_related_searches
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_expanded.concat(related)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  sleep 2 # Be nice to Google
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                # Combine all sources
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                all_expanded.concat(google_ads_suggestions)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                all_expanded = all_expanded.uniq
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Expanded to #{all_expanded.size} keywords (#{google_ads_suggestions.uniq.size} from Google Ads API)"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                # Semantic similarity filter (fast, catches obvious mismatches)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                semantically_filtered = filter_by_semantic_similarity(all_expanded)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "After semantic filtering: #{semantically_filtered.size} keywords"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add all semantically-filtered keywords
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                # (No AI filter - it was inconsistent and expensive)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                # Rely on: semantic similarity + volume + opportunity for quality
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                semantically_filtered.each do |keyword|
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                  add_keyword(keyword, source: "expansion")
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Added #{@keywords.size} keywords (will filter by volume >= 10 and opportunity after metrics)"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

              def mine_reddit
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 3: Mining Reddit..."
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword_research.seed_keywords.first(5).each do |seed| # Limit to first 5 seeds for Reddit
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                  miner = RedditMinerService.new(seed)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                  reddit_keywords = miner.mine
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  reddit_keywords.each { |kw| add_keyword(kw, source: "reddit") }
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                  sleep 2 # Be nice to Reddit
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "After Reddit mining: #{@keywords.size} unique keywords"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

              def analyze_competitors
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless @project.competitors.any?
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 4: Analyzing competitors..."
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                analyzer = CompetitorAnalysisService.new(@project)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                competitor_data = analyzer.analyze_all
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                competitor_data.each do |data|
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                  add_keyword(data[:keyword], source: data[:source])
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "After competitor analysis: #{@keywords.size} unique keywords"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_metrics
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 5: Calculating metrics for #{@keywords.size} keywords..."
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                # Try to use Google Ads API for batch metrics (more efficient)
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                use_google_ads = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_DEVELOPER_TOKEN"].present?
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                if use_google_ads && @keywords.size > 0
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Attempting to fetch real metrics from Google Ads API..."
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Batch fetch from Google Ads API
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords_array = @keywords.keys
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                  batch_metrics = KeywordMetricsService.calculate_batch(keywords_array, use_google_ads: true)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Apply metrics to our keywords hash
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                  batch_metrics.each do |metrics|
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                    kw = metrics[:keyword]
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless @keywords[kw]
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                    @keywords[kw][:volume] = metrics[:volume]
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                    @keywords[kw][:difficulty] = metrics[:difficulty]
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                    @keywords[kw][:cpc] = metrics[:cpc]
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                    @keywords[kw][:intent] = metrics[:intent]
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Pass semantic similarity to opportunity calculation
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                    semantic_similarity = @keyword_similarities[kw]
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                    @keywords[kw][:opportunity] = KeywordMetricsService.calculate_opportunity(
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                      metrics,
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                      semantic_similarity: semantic_similarity
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      281.
