    281. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Fall back to heuristics for each keyword
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                  @keywords.each do |kw, data|
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                    metrics_service = KeywordMetricsService.new(kw)
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                    metrics = metrics_service.calculate
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                    data[:volume] = metrics[:volume]
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                    data[:difficulty] = metrics[:difficulty]
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                    data[:cpc] = metrics[:cpc]
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                    data[:intent] = metrics[:intent]
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Pass semantic similarity to opportunity calculation
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                    semantic_similarity = @keyword_similarities[kw]
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                    data[:opportunity] = KeywordMetricsService.calculate_opportunity(
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                      metrics,
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                      semantic_similarity: semantic_similarity
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Metrics calculated for all keywords"
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

              def add_keyword(keyword, source: "unknown", confidence: nil)
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                keyword = keyword.downcase.strip
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                return if keyword.empty?
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

                return if keyword.length > 100 # Too long (likely sentence, not keyword)
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                return if keyword.length < 3 # Too short
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                @keywords[keyword] ||= {
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword: keyword,
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

                  sources: [],
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume: nil,
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                  difficulty: nil,
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                  cpc: nil,
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                  opportunity: nil,
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

                  intent: nil,
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

                  confidence: nil # Will store "high", "medium", or nil for seed/competitor keywords
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                @keywords[keyword][:sources] << source unless @keywords[keyword][:sources].include?(source)
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                @keywords[keyword][:confidence] = confidence if confidence
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

              def save_keywords
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Step 6: Saving top keywords to database..."
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter out keywords with very low or no search volume
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                viable_keywords = @keywords.values.select do |kw|
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                  kw[:volume] && kw[:volume] >= 10
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Filtered to #{viable_keywords.size} keywords with volume >= 10"
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

                # Sort by opportunity score (highest first), treating nil as 0
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

                sorted = viable_keywords.sort_by { |kw| -(kw[:opportunity] || 0) }
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                # Save ALL viable keywords (no cap for now - see full distribution)
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                top_keywords = sorted
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                top_keywords.each do |kw_data|
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                  @keyword_research.keywords.create!(
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

                    keyword: kw_data[:keyword],
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

                    volume: kw_data[:volume],
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                    difficulty: kw_data[:difficulty],
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                    opportunity: kw_data[:opportunity],
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            
              
            

                    cpc: kw_data[:cpc],
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            
              
            

                    intent: kw_data[:intent],
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            
              
            

                    sources: kw_data[:sources]
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Saved #{top_keywords.size} keywords (filtered from #{@keywords.size} total, #{viable_keywords.size} with volume >= 10)"
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            
              
            

              # Build semantic "fingerprint" of domain for similarity matching
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            
              
            

              # ENHANCED: Creates rich, detailed context for better semantic filtering
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_domain_context
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_data = @project.domain_analysis
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            
              
            

                # If no domain analysis, scrape it now (critical for semantic filtering)
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_data.nil? || domain_data.empty?
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No domain analysis found, scraping domain for context..."
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            
              
            

                  service = DomainAnalysisService.new(@project.domain)
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            
              
            

                  domain_data = service.analyze
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Cache it for future use
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            
              
            

                  @project.update(domain_analysis: domain_data) if domain_data && !domain_data[:error]
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            
              
            

                # If scraping failed or returned minimal data, fall back to basic context
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_data.nil? || domain_data.empty? || domain_data[:error]
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Could not scrape domain, using basic context (project name + niche)"
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            
              
            

                  return [@project.name, @project.niche, @project.description].compact.join(". ")
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            
              
            

                # Convert to symbol keys if needed (domain_analysis is stored with string keys in JSONB)
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_data = domain_data.deep_symbolize_keys if domain_data.is_a?(Hash)
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build context parts
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            
              
            

                context_parts = []
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            
              
            

                # 1. Core business description (what you do)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            
              
            

                context_parts << domain_data[:title] if domain_data[:title].present?
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            
              
            

                context_parts << domain_data[:meta_description] if domain_data[:meta_description].present?
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            
              
            

                # 2. Detailed problem/solution context
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add explicit statements about what the business does
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            
              
            

                if @project.description.present?
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << "This business: #{@project.description}"
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            
              
            

                if @project.niche.present?
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << "Industry: #{@project.niche}"
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            
              
            

                # 3. Headings (if available - only for non-SPA sites)
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_data[:h1s]&.any?
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << "Main topics: #{domain_data[:h1s].first(3).join(', ')}"
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_data[:h2s]&.any?
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << "Content areas: #{domain_data[:h2s].first(5).join(', ')}"
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            
              
            

                # 4. Sitemap keywords (good signal for SPA sites)
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_data[:sitemap_keywords]&.any?
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << "Site sections: #{domain_data[:sitemap_keywords].first(10).join(', ')}"
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            
              
            

                # 5. Seed keywords (CRITICAL - these define the semantic space)
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            
              
            

                if @keyword_research&.seed_keywords&.any?
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Include ALL seed keywords, not just first 10 - they're the ground truth
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << "Target keywords: #{@keyword_research.seed_keywords.join(', ')}"
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            
              
            

                # 6. Project metadata as fallback
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            
              
            

                if context_parts.size < 3
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Limited context available, adding fallback metadata"
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << @project.name
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            
              
            

                  context_parts << @project.niche if @project.niche.present?
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            
              
            

                context = context_parts.compact.join(". ")
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Built domain context (#{context.length} chars): #{context.first(200)}..."
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            

            
              
            

                context
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            

            
              
            

              # Filter keywords by semantic similarity to domain context
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            

            
              
            

              def filter_by_semantic_similarity(keywords)
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            
              
            

                return keywords if keywords.empty?
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_context = build_domain_context
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity_service = SemanticSimilarityService.new
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            

            
              
            

                # Batch calculate similarity for all keywords
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity_results = similarity_service.batch_similarity(domain_context, keywords)
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            

            
              
            

                # DON'T reset @keyword_similarities - we want to preserve seed similarities calculated earlier
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            

            
              
            

                # @keyword_similarities already initialized in initialize() and populated in generate_seed_keywords()
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter and log rejected keywords
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            
              
            

                filtered_keywords = []
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            
              
            

                rejected_count = 0
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity_results.each do |result|
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            

            
              
            

                  if result[:similarity] >= SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            
              
            

                    filtered_keywords << result[:keyword]
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            
              
            

                    @keyword_similarities[result[:keyword]] = result[:similarity] # Store for opportunity calc
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            
              
            

                    rejected_count += 1
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "   Rejected '#{result[:keyword]}' (similarity: #{result[:similarity].round(3)})"
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Semantic filter removed #{rejected_count} keywords (threshold: #{SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD})"
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            
              
            

                filtered_keywords
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            
              
            

              # Build rich competitor discovery query for Grounding
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_competitor_discovery_query(domain_data)
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            
              
            

                domain = @project.domain.gsub(%r{^https?://}, '').gsub(%r{^www\.}, '').gsub(%r{/$}, '')
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract clean description from project description field
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            
              
            

                # (May contain "Title: ... Description: ..." format)
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            
              
            

                raw_description = @project.description.presence || "#{@project.name} - #{@project.niche}"
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            
              
            

                # Try to extract just the description part if it's in "Description: X" format
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            
              
            

                description = if raw_description.include?("Description:")
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            
              
            

                  raw_description.split("Description:").last.strip
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            
              
            

                  raw_description
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build query - ask for 30 competitors with relevance scores
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            
              
            

                <<~QUERY
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            
              
            

                  I need COMPETING PRODUCTS/SERVICES (not articles or blogs) for:
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{description}
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            
              
            

                  My website: #{@project.domain}
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            
              
            

                  SEARCH FOR: Other software tools, apps, or services that do the same thing.
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            
              
            

                  DO NOT INCLUDE:
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Blog posts or articles ABOUT this topic (medium.com, facebook.com, etc.)
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            
              
            

                  - News sites or content platforms
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Tutorial or how-to sites
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            
              
            

                  - General business directories
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            
              
            

                  ONLY INCLUDE:
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Actual competing software/SaaS tools
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Direct competitors where this is their MAIN product
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Alternative tools/services users would choose instead of #{domain}
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            

            
              
            

                  Examples of GOOD results: "competitor-tool.com", "alternative-app.io"
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            

            
              
            

                  Examples of BAD results: "medium.com/article", "techcrunch.com/review"
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            

            
              
            

                  For each competitor, rate relevance 1-10:
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            

            
              
            

                  - 10 = Direct competitor, exact same service
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            

            
              
            

                  - 7-9 = Very similar service, same target market
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            

            
              
            

                  - 5-6 = Related service, different approach
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Below 5 = Don't include
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            

            
              
            

                  Return ONLY valid JSON (no markdown):
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            

            
              
            

                  [
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            

            
              
            

                      "domain": "competitor1.com",
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            

            
              
            

                      "relevance_score": 9,
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            

            
              
            

                      "reason": "Brief reason"
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            

            
              
            

                  ]
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            

            
              
            

                  Focus on finding actual competing tools, not content about the topic.
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            

            
              
            

                QUERY
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            

            
              
            

              # Parse competitor domains from Grounding JSON response
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            

            
              
            

              # Filters to only include competitors with relevance_score >= 7 (strict filtering for primary focus)
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_competitor_domains(data)
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            

            
              
            

                competitors = case data
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            

            
              
            

                when Array
          
      523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    523. 
            

            
              
            

                  # New format: array of objects with domain, relevance_score, reason
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            

            
              
            

                  if data.first.is_a?(Hash) && data.first.key?("domain")
          
      525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    525. 
            

            
              
            

                    data.select { |c| c["relevance_score"].to_i >= 7 }
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            

            
              
            

                        .sort_by { |c| -c["relevance_score"].to_i }
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            

            
              
            

                        .map { |c| normalize_domain(c["domain"]) }
          
      528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    528. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    529. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Old format: array of strings
          
      530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    530. 
            

            
              
            

                    data.map { |c| normalize_domain(c) }
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    532. 
            

            
              
            

                when Hash
          
      533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    533. 
            

            
              
            

                  (data["competitors"] || data["domains"] || []).map { |c| normalize_domain(c) }
          
      534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    534. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            

            
              
            

                  []
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            

            
              
            

                competitors.compact.uniq.first(30) # Increased to 30 since we're filtering by score
          
      539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    539. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    540. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            

            
              
            

              # Normalize domain format
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            

            
              
            

              def normalize_domain(competitor)
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if competitor.blank?
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            

            
              
            

                domain = competitor.is_a?(Hash) ? (competitor["domain"] || competitor["url"]) : competitor
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if domain.blank?
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            

            
              
            

                domain = domain.to_s.strip
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            

            
              
            

                               .gsub(%r{^https?://}, '')
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            

            
              
            

                               .gsub(%r{^www\.}, '')
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            

            
              
            

                               .gsub(%r{/$}, '')
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            

            
              
            

                               .split('/').first
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if domain.empty? || !domain.include?('.')
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            

            
              
            

                domain.downcase
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      559.

    app/services/plans_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    108 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 108 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed.

            class PlansService

              # Environment-specific price IDs

                  pro: "price_prod_pro",  # Replace with actual Stripe price ID

      16.

              }.freeze

              # Get current environment price IDs
          
      19.

              def self.current_price_ids
          
      20.

                env = Rails.env.to_sym

                PRICE_IDS[env] || PRICE_IDS[:development]

      23.

              # Centralized plan configuration - single source of truth

              def self.plan_config

                price_ids = current_price_ids

                {
          
      29.

                  "free" => {

                    name: "Free",
          
      31.

                    price: 0,

                    stripe_price_id: nil,

                    popular: false,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    features: [
          
      35.

                      "Basic features",

                      "Email support",
          
      37.

                      "Cancel anytime"
          
      38.

      39.

                  },
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  price_ids[:pro] => {
          
      41.

                    name: "Pro",
          
      42.

                    price: 19.0,

                    stripe_price_id: price_ids[:pro],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    popular: true,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    features: [

            # app/services/reddit_miner_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Mines Reddit for keyword opportunities from user discussions
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class RedditMinerService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              USER_AGENT = "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; VerySimpleSEO/1.0)"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = keyword
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def mine
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Mining Reddit for: #{@keyword}"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Reddit search API (free, no auth required)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  query = URI.encode_www_form_component(@keyword)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  uri = URI("https://www.reddit.com/search.json?q=#{query}&limit=50&sort=relevance")
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  request["User-Agent"] = USER_AGENT
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.hostname, uri.port, use_ssl: true, open_timeout: 5, read_timeout: 10) do |http|
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    http.request(request)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  data = JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract post titles
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  titles = data.dig('data', 'children')&.map { |post| post.dig('data', 'title') } || []
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract keywords from titles (questions and phrases)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords = titles.flat_map do |title|
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    extract_keywords_from_text(title)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords = keywords.compact.uniq.reject(&:empty?)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Found #{keywords.size} keywords from Reddit" if keywords.any?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Reddit mining failed: #{e.message}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  []
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

              def extract_keywords_from_text(text)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                return [] if text.nil? || text.empty?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = []
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                text = text.downcase
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract question-based keywords
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?('how to')
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords << text[/how to [^?.!]+/]
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?('what is')
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords << text[/what is [^?.!]+/]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?('best way')
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords << text[/best way [^?.!]+/]
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?('how do i')
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords << text[/how do i [^?.!]+/]
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?('should i')
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords << text[/should i [^?.!]+/]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract phrases containing the current seed keyword
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                if text.include?(@keyword.downcase)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract 5 words before and after
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  match = text[/.{0,50}#{Regexp.escape(@keyword.downcase)}.{0,50}/]
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords << match if match
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.compact.map(&:strip)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      84.

    app/services/seed_keyword_generator.rb

            # app/services/seed_keyword_generator.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Generates seed keywords using Google Grounding (FREE) based on ACTUAL domain content + competitor analysis
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class SeedKeywordGenerator
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(project_or_domain, niche: nil, competitors: [])
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                # Support both Project object and raw domain data
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                if project_or_domain.is_a?(String)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Raw domain mode (for autofill before project exists)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  @project = nil
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  @domain = project_or_domain
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  @niche = niche
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  @competitors = competitors
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Project mode (normal usage)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  @project = project_or_domain
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  @domain = @project.domain
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  @niche = @project.niche
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  @competitors = @project.competitors.pluck(:domain)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                @grounding = GoogleGroundingService.new
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                @api_calls_used = 0
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              # New method: accepts competitor DOMAINS (not scraped data)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              # Grounding will research them directly
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate_with_competitors(competitor_domains)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Generating seed keywords with Grounding for: #{@domain}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Using #{competitor_domains.size} competitor domains for context"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate seeds via Grounding (it will analyze domain + competitors)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                seeds = generate_seeds_via_grounding(competitor_domains)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                @api_calls_used += 1
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "  Generated #{seeds.size} seeds from Grounding (API calls: #{@api_calls_used})"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Total API calls used: #{@api_calls_used}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                seeds
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

              # DEPRECATED: Old scraping-based method - use generate_with_competitors instead
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

              #   result = @grounding.search_json(query, json_structure_hint: json_structure)

              #   unless result[:success]
          
      94.

              #     Rails.logger.warn "Competitor discovery failed: #{result[:error]}"
          
      95.

              #   # Parse competitor domains from JSON response
          
      99.

              #   competitors = result[:data]
          
      100.

              #
          
      101.
