              #   # Handle different response formats
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

              #   competitors = case competitors
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              #   when Array
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

              #     competitors.map { |c| normalize_competitor(c) }
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              #   when Hash
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

              #     (competitors["competitors"] || competitors["domains"] || []).map { |c| normalize_competitor(c) }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

              #   else
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

              #     []
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

              #   end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

              #   competitors.compact.uniq.first(10)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

              # rescue => e
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

              #   Rails.logger.error "Competitor discovery error: #{e.message}"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              #   []
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

              # end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

              # def scrape_competitors(competitor_domains)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

              #   return [] if competitor_domains.empty?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

              #   Rails.logger.info "Scraping #{competitor_domains.size} competitors..."
          
      121.

      122.

              #   competitor_data = []
          
      123.

              #
          
      124.

              #   competitor_domains.first(10).each do |competitor_domain|
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              #     Rails.logger.info "  Scraping #{competitor_domain}..."
          
      126.

              #     service = DomainAnalysisService.new(competitor_domain)
          
      127.

              #     data = service.analyze
          
      128.

      129.

              #     if data && !data[:error]
          
      130.

              #       competitor_data << data
          
      131.

              #     end
          
      132.

              #     sleep 1 # Be nice to servers
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

              #   end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              #   competitor_data
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

              # end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

              # Generate seeds via Grounding - let it research the domain + competitors
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate_seeds_via_grounding(competitor_domains)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                # Clean the description (same fix as competitor discovery)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                raw_description = if @project
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  @project.description.presence || "#{@project.name} - #{@niche}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  @niche || "Unknown business"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                description = if raw_description.include?("Description:")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  raw_description.split("Description:").last.strip
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  raw_description
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build competitor list for Grounding to research
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                competitor_list = if competitor_domains.any?
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor_domains.first(10).map { |d| "- https://#{d}" }.join("\n")
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  "(No competitors provided - analyze the main domain only)"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                query = <<~QUERY
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  Analyze this business and generate 20 high-quality SEO seed keywords.
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  BUSINESS TO ANALYZE:
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{description}
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  Website: #{@domain}
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  TOP COMPETITORS (for context):
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{competitor_list}
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  IMPORTANT: Visit the website and analyze what they ACTUALLY offer.
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  Do NOT generate keywords based only on the domain name.
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  Generate 20 seed keywords that:
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Match EXACTLY what this business does (their specific use case)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Have clear search intent (what users would actually search for)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Are specific to this tool's category (not generic adjacent categories)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Focus on the core value proposition and target audience
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVOID generating keywords for:
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Adjacent but different tools (e.g., if this is idea validation, don't include business plan keywords)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Generic categories that are too broad
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Features this tool doesn't have
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Unrelated AI tools just because this uses AI
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  QUALITY RULES:
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Each keyword should be something a user would search when looking for THIS specific type of tool
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Prefer specific over generic (e.g., "startup idea validation tool" > "business tools")
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include the main category/use case in most keywords
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  Return ONLY a JSON array of keyword strings (no objects, just strings):
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  ["keyword 1", "keyword 2", "keyword 3"]
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                  No markdown code blocks, just pure JSON.
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                QUERY
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                json_structure = ["keyword 1", "keyword 2", "keyword 3"].to_json
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                result = @grounding.search_json(query, json_structure_hint: json_structure)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                unless result[:success]
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Seed generation failed: #{result[:error]}, using fallback"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  return fallback_seeds(description)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                # Parse keywords from JSON response
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = result[:data]
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle different response formats
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = case keywords
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                when Array
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords.map { |k| clean_keyword(k) }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                when Hash
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                  (keywords["keywords"] || keywords["seeds"] || []).map { |k| clean_keyword(k) }
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                  []
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.compact.uniq.first(20)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Seed generation error: #{e.message}, using fallback"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                fallback_seeds(description)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

              # Fallback to OpenAI if Grounding fails
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

              def fallback_to_openai(domain_data, competitor_data)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Using OpenAI fallback for seed generation"
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_keyword_analysis
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = build_openai_prompt(domain_data, competitor_data)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  system_prompt: "You are an expert SEO strategist who generates keyword ideas based on actual website content.",
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 2000,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                if response[:success]
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                  parse_keywords(response[:content])
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "OpenAI fallback also failed: #{response[:error]}"
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                  fallback_seeds(domain_data)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_openai_prompt(domain_data, competitor_data)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                title = domain_data[:title] || "Unknown"
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                meta_desc = domain_data[:meta_description] || "Not available"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                h1s = domain_data[:h1s]&.join(", ") || "Not available"
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                h2s = domain_data[:h2s]&.first(5)&.join(", ") || "Not available"
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                competitor_insights = ""
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                if competitor_data.any?
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor_insights = "\nCOMPETITOR ANALYSIS:\n"
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                  competitor_data.each_with_index do |comp_data, index|
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    comp_title = comp_data[:title] || "Unknown"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                    comp_h1s = comp_data[:h1s]&.first(3)&.join(", ") || "Not available"
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                    competitor_insights += "Competitor #{index + 1}: #{comp_title}\nKey Topics: #{comp_h1s}\n\n"
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                  I need seed keywords for an SEO content strategy.
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                  DOMAIN ANALYSIS (based on actual website content):
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                  Domain: #{@domain}
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                  Page Title: #{title}
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                  Meta Description: #{meta_desc}
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                  Main Headings (H1s): #{h1s}
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                  Content Topics (H2s): #{h2s}
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{@niche.present? ? "Niche: #{@niche}" : ""}
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{competitor_insights}
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  Based on the ACTUAL content from this website (not just the domain name), generate 20-30 seed keywords with STRATEGIC DIVERSITY:
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                  HIGH-VOLUME BROAD (5-8 keywords, 1-2 words) - The "money" keywords, even if competitive
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                  MEDIUM-COMPETITION (6-9 keywords, 2-4 words) - Realistic wins within 6-12 months
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                  LOW-COMPETITION LONG-TAIL (6-9 keywords, 4-6 words) - Quick wins, very specific
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                  Return ONLY the keywords, one per line, without numbering or extra explanation.
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                  Focus on keywords with commercial or informational intent.
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

              def normalize_competitor(competitor)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if competitor.blank?
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                domain = competitor.is_a?(Hash) ? (competitor["domain"] || competitor["url"]) : competitor
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if domain.blank?
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                domain = domain.to_s.strip
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                               .gsub(%r{^https?://}, '')
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                               .gsub(%r{^www\.}, '')
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                               .gsub(%r{/$}, '')
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                               .split('/').first
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if domain.empty? || !domain.include?('.')
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                domain.downcase
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

              def clean_keyword(keyword)
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if keyword.blank?
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                kw = keyword.is_a?(Hash) ? (keyword["keyword"] || keyword["text"]) : keyword
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if kw.blank?
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                kw = kw.to_s.strip
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

                       .gsub(/^["'\(\)]/, '')
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                       .gsub(/["'\(\)]$/, '')
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                       .gsub(/\s+/, ' ')
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

                       .downcase
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless valid_keyword?(kw)
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                kw
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

              def valid_keyword?(keyword)
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                return false if keyword.blank?
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                return false if keyword.length < 2 || keyword.length > 100 # Allow 2-letter keywords like "ai", "ux"
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                return false if keyword.split.size > 8
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

                return false if keyword.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                true
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_keywords(content)
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = content.split("\n")
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .map { |line| line.strip }
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .map { |line| line.gsub(/^\d+[\.\)]\s*/, '') }
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .map { |line| line.gsub(/^[-*]\s*/, '') }
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .select { |line| line.length > 0 && line.length < 100 }
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .map(&:downcase)
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.uniq
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

              def fallback_seeds(description)
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.warn "Using fallback: generating basic seeds from description/domain"
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                seeds = []
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

                # If description is empty, try to extract from domain name
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                if description.blank? || description.strip.empty?
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Description is empty, using domain name for fallback"
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            
              
            

                  domain_name = extract_domain_name_from_url(@domain)
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            
              
            

                  description = "#{domain_name} #{@niche}" if @niche.present?
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            
              
            

                  description = domain_name if description.blank?
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract key terms from description
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            
              
            

                words = description.downcase.split(/\W+/)
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            
              
            

                common_words = %w[the a an and or but for with from about in on at to of is are was were be been being have has had do does did will would could should may might must can]
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            
              
            

                key_terms = words.reject { |w| common_words.include?(w) || w.length < 3 }.uniq
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate basic seed variations
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            
              
            

                key_terms.first(5).each do |term|
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << term
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "#{term} tool"
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "best #{term}"
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "how to #{term}"
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "#{term} software"
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add niche-specific seeds if available
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            
              
            

                if @niche.present?
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << @niche
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "#{@niche} guide"
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "best #{@niche}"
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add domain-based seeds as absolute fallback
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            
              
            

                domain_name = extract_domain_name_from_url(@domain)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            
              
            

                if domain_name.present?
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << domain_name
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "#{domain_name} alternative"
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            
              
            

                  seeds << "#{domain_name} review"
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Fallback generated #{seeds.compact.uniq.size} seeds"
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            
              
            

                seeds.compact.uniq.first(20)
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            
              
            

              def extract_domain_name_from_url(url)
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract domain name from URL (e.g., "signallab" from "https://signallab.app")
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            
              
            

                uri = URI.parse(url)
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            
              
            

                host = uri.host.gsub(/^www\./, '')
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            
              
            

                host.split('.').first
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            
              
            

                "tool"
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      395.

    app/services/semantic_similarity_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    99 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 99 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/semantic_similarity_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Uses OpenAI embeddings API for semantic similarity calculations
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class SemanticSimilarityService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              EMBEDDING_MODEL = "text-embedding-3-small" # Cheaper, faster, good enough for filtering
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS = 1536 # Default dimension for text-embedding-3-small
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              OPENAI_EMBEDDINGS_URL = "https://api.openai.com/v1/embeddings"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              MAX_BATCH_SIZE = 2000 # OpenAI limit is 2048, leave buffer
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                @api_key = ENV['OPENAI_API_KEY']
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                raise "OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable not set" if @api_key.nil? || @api_key.empty?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              # Calculate similarity between two texts
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              def similarity(text1, text2)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                embeddings = get_embeddings([text1, text2])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                cosine_similarity(embeddings[0], embeddings[1])
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              # Calculate similarity between base text and multiple keywords (batch)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              # Returns array of { keyword: String, similarity: Float }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              def batch_similarity(base_text, keywords)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                return [] if keywords.empty?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                # OpenAI has a limit of 2048 inputs per request
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                # So we need to batch if we have more than 2047 keywords (+ 1 for base_text)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                if keywords.size <= MAX_BATCH_SIZE
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Small enough to do in one request
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_texts = [base_text] + keywords
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  embeddings = get_embeddings(all_texts)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  base_embedding = embeddings[0]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords.each_with_index.map do |keyword, i|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                      keyword: keyword,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      similarity: cosine_similarity(base_embedding, embeddings[i + 1])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Too many keywords - need to batch
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Batching #{keywords.size} keywords into chunks of #{MAX_BATCH_SIZE}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get base embedding once
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  base_embedding = get_embeddings([base_text])[0]
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Process keywords in batches
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  results = []
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywords.each_slice(MAX_BATCH_SIZE) do |batch|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    batch_embeddings = get_embeddings(batch)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    batch.each_with_index do |keyword, i|
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                      results << {
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                        keyword: keyword,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                        similarity: cosine_similarity(base_embedding, batch_embeddings[i])
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  results
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              # Embed a single text (returns vector array)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              def embed(text)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                get_embeddings([text])[0]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              # Embed multiple texts (returns array of vectors)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

              def batch_embed(texts)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                get_embeddings(texts)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

              # Call OpenAI embeddings API using HTTP
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

              def get_embeddings(texts)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                require 'net/http'
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                require 'json'
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                # Clean texts (remove empty, truncate very long)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                cleaned_texts = texts.map do |text|
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  t = text.to_s.strip
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  t.empty? ? "unknown" : t[0..8000] # Truncate to ~8K chars (API limit is ~8K tokens)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build request
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                uri = URI(OPENAI_EMBEDDINGS_URL)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                http.use_ssl = true
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                http.read_timeout = 30
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.path, {
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  'Authorization' => "Bearer #{@api_key}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                })
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                request.body = {
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  model: EMBEDDING_MODEL,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  input: cleaned_texts,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  encoding_format: "float"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                }.to_json
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                # Make request
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                response = http.request(request)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                unless response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "API request failed: #{response.code} - #{response.body}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                # Parse response
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                data = JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                data["data"].map { |d| d["embedding"] }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "=" * 100
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "CRITICAL: OpenAI Embeddings API FAILED"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "=" * 100
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Error: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Texts count: #{texts.size}"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "First text (#{texts.first.to_s.length} chars): #{texts.first.to_s[0..200]}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Backtrace:"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(10).join("\n")
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "=" * 100
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "RETURNING ZERO VECTORS - ALL SIMILARITIES WILL BE 0.0"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "=" * 100
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                # Return zero vectors as fallback (will have 0 similarity)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                Array.new(texts.size) { Array.new(EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS, 0.0) }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

              # Calculate cosine similarity between two vectors
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

              def cosine_similarity(vec1, vec2)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0.0 if vec1.nil? || vec2.nil?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0.0 if vec1.empty? || vec2.empty?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0.0 if vec1.size != vec2.size
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                dot_product = vec1.zip(vec2).sum { |a, b| a * b }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                magnitude1 = Math.sqrt(vec1.sum { |a| a**2 })
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                magnitude2 = Math.sqrt(vec2.sum { |a| a**2 })
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0.0 if magnitude1.zero? || magnitude2.zero?
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                dot_product / (magnitude1 * magnitude2)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      146.

    app/services/serp_grounding_research_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    301 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 301 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed.
